tika-vin10t:26: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṃ cuto.
tika-vin10t:77: Nimittaṃ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:103: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t:148: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṃ vā, lataṃ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t:151: Pathaviṃ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṃsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t:152: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:160: Uddharantassa khāṇuṃ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t:161: Thullaccayaṃ tato kumbhiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:163: Paṭhamaṃ pana kumbhiṃ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:164: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṃ vā, saṅkhaliṃ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t:166: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:169: Jātaṃ chindati ce rukkhaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t:175: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṃ, muṭṭhiṃ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t:176: Bhājane vā gataṃ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t:178: Hāraṃ vā pana pāmaṅgaṃ, suttāruḷhaṃ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t:179: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:185: Sakalampi ca taṃ kumbhiṃ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t:187: Sace khipati yaṃ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṃ telakumbhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:188: Taṃ pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ, dhuvaṃ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t:191: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṃ, telaṃ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t:194: Pītaṃ telañca taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, uddharantova dhaṃsito.
tika-vin10t:196: Tattheva bhindato telaṃ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:197: Jhāpentassa abhogaṃ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:208: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t:214: Hatthaṃ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:216: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:222: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t:223: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṃ, sayaṃ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:226: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṃ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:228: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṃ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t:231: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t:234: Sace gaṇhāti taṃ moraṃ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t:235: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:237: Itaraṃ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:238: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t:240: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṃ taṃ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t:241: Pāde thullaccayaṃ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:249: Chijjamānaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:255: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t:256: Taṃ taṃ tassa bhave ṭhānaṃ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:262: Saṃharitvā sace vaṃse, ṭhapitaṃ hoti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:263: Katvā punorato bhogaṃ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t:266: Na tu cīvaravaṃso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t:269: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṃ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t:274: Uddhaṃ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṃ pana vaṃsato;
tika-vin10t:277: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:284: Saṃharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:286: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṃ, laggitaṃ hoti bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:287: Sikkāto taṃ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t:290: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:299: Bhittiṃ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:301: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṃ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t:302: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:304: Piṇḍiṃ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:312: Vatthu taṃ chindato pupphaṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ vade.
tika-vin10t:315: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṃ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t:321: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t:324: Cāletvā udakaṃ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:329: Accuggatassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ, jalato sakalaṃ jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:335: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:336: Na tassa udakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:338: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:341: Tassevaṃ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t:347: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t:351: Ninne macchavisaṃ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t:353: Pacchā macchavisaṃ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:359: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t:360: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:363: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t:375: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:383: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t:384: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṃ tassā dvidhā mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:387: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:390: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:403: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:409: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṃ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:410: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:413: Acāventova taṃ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t:416: Sayameva ca gacchantiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:419: Yānaṃ nāma ratho vayhaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t:426: Yānaṃ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t:437: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:438: Thullaccayaṃ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t:447: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:449: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:452: Phusitvā yaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhūmiṃ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t:462: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t:465: Khandhaṃ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:476: Parājeti paraṃ dhammaṃ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t:479: Parajjati sayaṃ dhammaṃ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:490: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t:492: Yasmiṃ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:493: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:495: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t:507: Tañca kho sāmikānaṃ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t:510: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:514: Rajjuṃ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṃ pāteti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:516: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:517: Ādo thullaccayaṃ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:521: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:524: Tiṇaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, lataṃ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:528: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t:533: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:537: Citte cintento vā aññaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t:555: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṃ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:557: Vāpiyaṃ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t:563: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t:570: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t:571: Ābhataṃ tāva taṃ sabbaṃ, tesameva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:573: Tasmā taṃ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:576: Yadā niyyāditaṃ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:580: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṃ viya na hotidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:583: Aggiṃ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t:586: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t:590: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:602: Nivatthaṃ pana vatthaṃ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t:603: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṃ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t:605: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:614: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t:617: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t:618: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t:620: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṃ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t:626: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:639: ‘‘Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṃ kiṃ nu dassati’’;
tika-vin10t:642: Tasmiṃ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṃ;
tika-vin10t:649: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t:650: Dhuvaṃ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t:652: Taṃ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:653: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:655: Patitvā bhūmiyaṃ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṃ pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:658: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t:662: Sārato taṃ gahetabbaṃ, yuttaṃ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t:664: Sayaṃ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:665: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṃ taṃ, gataṃ nāsakaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:667: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:670: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṃ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:673: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t:676: Sace pājeti taṃ yānaṃ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṃ;
tika-vin10t:679: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṃ suṅkaṃ, gantuṃ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:683: Antojātaṃ dhanakkītaṃ, dinnaṃ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:686: Bhujissaṃ vā harantassa, mānusaṃ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:701: Saṇikaṃ pana gacchantaṃ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t:702: Sīghaṃ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t:704: Palāyitvā sace aññaṃ, gāmaṃ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t:705: Gataṃ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t:718: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:720: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṃ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t:724: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:734: Ṭhānaṃ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṃ sakalaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:737: Tasmā tesaṃ vasā hatthiṃ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t:739: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t:742: Nipannassa gajassekaṃ, ṭhānaṃ taṃ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:743: Tasmiṃ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:750: Garukaṃ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:766: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṃ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:769: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t:774: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:775: Mārentassa paraṃ ghāto, ayaṃ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t:777: ‘‘Evaṃ tvaṃ paharitvā taṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:787: Ayaṃ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t:789: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t:795: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:796: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t:801: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:804: Evaṃ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t:805: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t:807: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t:810: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so ‘‘vatthū’’ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t:811: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṃ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t:813: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṃ taṃ sattamāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:819: ‘‘Yaṃ mārehī’’ti āṇatto, aññaṃ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t:828: Āṇatto ‘‘ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī’’ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:829: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t:837: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:842: ‘‘Imaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ veriṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t:843: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t:845: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t:848: ‘‘Vaneyevā’’ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t:855: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:860: Iti vutto sace veriṃ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t:867: Māreti naṃ nisinnaṃ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:870: Vutto māreti gacchantaṃ, nisinnaṃ vā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-vin10t:873: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t:875: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:878: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:879: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t:884: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ, kāḷaṃ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t:887: Sopi yaṃ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:891: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:894: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:896: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṃ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:899: ‘‘Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū’’ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t:900: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t:905: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṃ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t:911: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t:912: Patitaṃ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t:914: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t:915: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṃ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:923: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:927: Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t:932: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṃ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t:935: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t:938: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t:941: Yo pāsaṃ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t:942: Taṃ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t:944: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:947: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṃ sayaṃkataṃ;
tika-vin10t:948: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:950: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:951: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṃ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t:953: Ropentassa ca sūlaṃ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:978: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t:996: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:1000: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t:1014: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t:1045: Sukkaṃ yadi vimoceti, garukaṃ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t:1048: Thullaccayaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ, sace sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1051: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, yadi sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1053: Vatthiṃ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1075: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:1081: Aṅgulīnaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t:1082: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t:1112: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṃ, vāditaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1115: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t:1137: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṃ, itthīnaṃ garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:1139: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:1159: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1161: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t:1162: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1168: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṃ vijānanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1175: Vīmaṃsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:1190: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1192: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1218: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṃ ekakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1224: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṃ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t:1229: ‘‘Goṇaṃ demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1238: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1244: Pharasuṃ vāpi vāsiṃ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1245: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ rukkhaṃ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t:1250: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṃ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t:1251: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t:1254: Tathā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṃ kuṭiṃ.
tika-vin10t:1259: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṃ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1266: Adesetvā sace vatthuṃ, yo kareyya mahallakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1280: Suddhaṃ vā yadi vāsuddhaṃ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t:1294: Taṃ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1299: Atha sopi ‘‘mayā diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ vā’’ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:1300: Tesaṃ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:1302: Dūtaṃ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṃ vā pana sāsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1312: Tathā kammaṃ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1327: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:1331: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṃ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t:1334: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, ‘‘bhedatthaṃ mā parakkama’’;
tika-vin10t:1337: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1341: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1344: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṃ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t:1347: Dūtaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1350: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1358: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t:1365: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1395: Kamme kariyamāne taṃ, accajaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:1397: Cuṇṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ phalaṃ pupphaṃ, veḷuṃ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1409: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1412: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṃ, dātabbaṃ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t:1424: Gilānānaṃ manussānaṃ, dātabbaṃ tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1427: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t:1440: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṃ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1442: Sakiṃ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṃ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t:1443: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1446: Ropane paribhogatthaṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1448: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṃ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t:1452: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1454: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṃ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t:1461: Siñcane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1469: Ganthimaṃ gopphimaṃ nāma, vedhimaṃ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t:1472: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1481: Veṭhimaṃ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṃ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1490: Sabbametaṃ sayaṃ kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1494: Aññehi pūritaṃ puppha-paṭaṃ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t:1497: Kharapattamayaṃ mālaṃ, sabbaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1503: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṃ, pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1506: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1515: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṃ kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1523: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t:1526: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t:1529: Sace bhesajjametesaṃ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t:1530: Yācantipi ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1532: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1533: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā vā, ‘‘dassanti puna me ime’’.
tika-vin10t:1535: Etesaṃ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1539: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṃ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1541: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t:1544: Atha tesampi puttānaṃ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:1556: Jalaṃ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1558: Dātabbaṃ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1559: Attano udakaṃ tesaṃ, suttaṃ vā deti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1568: Ṭhapetvā taṃ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1571: Satthunā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t:1577: Pañcannaṃ sahadhammīnaṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1612: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t:1618: Chedaṃ vā vattabhedaṃ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t:1620: Parivāso visodhetuṃ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t:1621: Nikkhipitvāna taṃ vattaṃ, vatthabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1623: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t:1624: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṃ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:1636: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t:1641: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1642: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t:1644: Ārocetvāva taṃ vattaṃ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t:1654: Ekaccaṃ sakalaṃ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t:1668: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:1669: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṃ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t:1675: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t:1680: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t:1692: Nikkhipe santike tesaṃ, vattaṃ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t:1704: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṃ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:1717: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1724: Na karoti anāpattiṃ, itthīnaṃ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:1736: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t:1739: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t:1746: Cīvaraṃ chabbidhaṃ vuttaṃ, jātito pana kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1754: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1757: Rajitvā kappiyaṃ binduṃ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1761: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṃ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t:1777: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṃ vā, chinditabbaṃ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t:1781: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t:1798: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t:1801: Paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:1802: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:1831: Gaṇanaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t:1844: Puna paccuddharitvā taṃ, vikappeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:1846: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t:1877: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṃ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t:1886: Dukkaṭaṃ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1904: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1908: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṃ nu, kātabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1911: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1914: Na tassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:1916: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1920: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t:1925: There ca dahare maggaṃ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t:1929: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1932: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1935: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1945: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1953: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṃ, vatthaṃ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t:1957: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṃ dukkaṭadvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1959: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t:1960: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t:1969: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1971: ‘‘Dhovā’’ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṃ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t:1981: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1983: Avuttā paribhuttaṃ vā, aññaṃ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:2002: Aññaṃ pana parikkhāraṃ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:2013: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t:2022: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2023: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṃ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:2033: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2047: Akappiyaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2049: Rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:2050: Atthāya gaṇhituṃ kiñci, dīyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2055: Netvā akappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, itthaṃ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t:2058: Ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā, cetiyaṃ vā karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t:2059: Na ca vaṭṭati taṃ vatthuṃ, sabbesaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2061: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t:2064: Taṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nisedhetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2071: Gahaṇaṃ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:2074: Iccevaṃ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2076: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2080: Bhāgaṃ dethā’’ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t:2089: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṃ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2091: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t:2098: Āharanti ca yaṃ vuttā, sabbesaṃ tamakappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2103: ‘‘Gāvo demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2107: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2109: Hatthiṃ vā mahisaṃ assaṃ, goṇaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2110: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2112: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:2113: Mūlaṃ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2119: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t:2130: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2140: Anāpatti tulaṃ vāpi, bahuṃ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2147: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2150: Channaṃ orena vassānaṃ, karontassa ca santhataṃ;
tika-vin10t:2154: Kataṃ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:2170: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t:2176: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2185: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2189: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t:2194: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2195: Acchinnaṃ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṃ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t:2214: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t:2221: Suttaṃ vatthaṃ halaṃ phālaṃ, kappiyaṃ evamādikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2224: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2227: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2235: ‘‘Idaṃ ayyassa hotū’’ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:2238: Paṭikkhittepi taṃ vatthuṃ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:2239: Tathā gopāyitabbaṃ taṃ, yathā taṃ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t:2242: Iccevaṃ bhikkhuno vattuṃ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2248: Gahetuṃ aññato laddhaṃ, bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2250: Yaṃ kiñci pana sambhūtaṃ, paccayaṃ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t:2263: Vatthuṃ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṃ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2264: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṃ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2269: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2273: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2279: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2294: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2297: Sakaṃ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t:2298: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṃ, sayaṃ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2303: ‘‘Gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṃ imaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2304: Idaṃ nāma karohī’’ti, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2307: Challiṃ vā pana valliṃ vā, kaṭṭhaṃ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t:2320: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t:2326: ‘‘Idaṃ mamatthi attho me, iminā’’ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t:2332: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t:2337: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṃ sabbaṃ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:2338: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t:2341: Evaṃ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:2344: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ, na gacchanti vikappanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2352: Yaṃ pattaṃ na vikappeti, yaṃ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2367: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:2382: Yaṃ kiñci sodakaṃ pattaṃ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2385: Bhikkhuno sodakaṃ pattaṃ, otāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2388: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2389: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2400: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2407: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2410: Kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t:2416: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā, dhovituṃ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2417: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ patte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2419: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2426: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṃ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2427: Viññāpeyya navaṃ pattaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2432: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t:2433: Apatto nāmayaṃ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:2436: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:2438: Pattaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2441: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṃ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t:2442: Appicchatāya vā pattaṃ, taṃ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2449: Sace so taṃ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:2452: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2453: Attano ñātakādīnaṃ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t:2462: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2469: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṃ, sāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2474: Sayaṃ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2475: Tāpanaṃ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t:2477: Pacchābhattaṃ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2478: Vaṭṭateva ca taṃ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2485: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ;
tika-vin10t:2495: Khīraṃ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2497: ‘‘Yesaṃ kappati maṃsañhi, tesaṃ sappī’’ti kiṃ idaṃ?
tika-vin10t:2507: Telaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā, sappiṃ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t:2509: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2524: Attanā yaṃ kataṃ telaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2540: Vasānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, telaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2548: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṃ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2551: Paṭiggahetuṃ kātuṃ vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2563: Phāṇitaṃ tu purebhattaṃ, gahitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2570: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2573: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2576: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2585: Pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīraṃ, hoti taṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2593: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tu sattāhakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2594: Aruādīni makkhetuṃ, sāyituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2596: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2613: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t:2621: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṃ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t:2634: Sāmaṃ tu cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindantassa taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:2646: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṃ, bhikkhuṃ gaṇhāti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2650: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t:2664: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2681: Vīte nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2692: Sace akappiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t:2698: Dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2712: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2728: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṃ taṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:2736: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2744: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t:2747: Uttariṃ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṃ.
tika-vin10t:2755: Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t:2756: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2764: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:2765: Cīvarassa pavattiṃ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2768: Khippaṃ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:2777: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2783: Cīvaraṃ vā parasseka-mekaṃ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t:2784: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṃ, dve pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:2786: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2789: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2815: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2817: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2845: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t:2853: Dhammaṃ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2858: Dukkaṭaṃ hoti bhikkhusmiṃ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:2861: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t:2862: Bhaṇantaṃ paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2865: Uddesaṃ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t:2874: Tissannaṃ pana rattīnaṃ, uddhaṃ yo pana rattiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2875: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2877: Vatthuṃ yaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, methunassa pahonakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2881: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t:2886: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṃ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t:2901: Anāpatti dirattaṃ vā, tirattaṃ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t:2915: Rattiyaṃ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t:2925: Vinā dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t:2930: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, padādīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:2936: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṃ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:2937: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2940: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2945: Purise sati viññusmiṃ, sayaṃ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t:2948: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t:2956: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhūte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2958: No ce jānāti so vuttaṃ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:2967: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t:2978: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṃ, vadaṃ pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:2986: Vatthuṃ vā pana āpattiṃ, ārocentassa kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2993: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṃ yo akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2994: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3003: Iccevaṃ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3005: ‘‘Imaṃ khaṇa ca okāsaṃ, idha pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t:3006: Imasmiṃ khaṇa okāse’’, vattumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3008: ‘‘Kandaṃ khaṇa kurundaṃ vā, thūṇaṃ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3009: Mūlaṃ khaṇa ca tālaṃ vā’’, evaṃ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3011: ‘‘Imaṃ mūlaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ tālaṃ imaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3012: Khaṇā’’ti niyametvāna, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3015: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3020: Sace patati toyasmiṃ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3023: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t:3024: Rajaṃ patati ce pubbaṃ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t:3029: Vārinā paṭhamaṃ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3030: Taṃ vaṭṭati vikopetuṃ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t:3038: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṃ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3057: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṃ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t:3059: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṃ, gehaṃ chādenti taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:3062: Yattakaṃ tattha tintaṃ tu, tattakaṃ hotyakappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3063: Atintaṃ tattha yaṃ yaṃ tu, taṃ taṃ hoti hi kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3065: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t:3066: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:3071: Tattha laggaṃ rajaṃ saṇhaṃ, aghaṃsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t:3075: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3077: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṃ thambhaṃ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t:3078: Pathaviṃ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3080: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā, khāṇukaṃ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3081: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t:3083: Pāsāṇaṃ yadi vā rukkhaṃ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3084: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:3089: Kaṇṭakaṃ sūcimaṭṭhiṃ vā, khilaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:3090: Ākoṭetuṃ pavesetuṃ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3093: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3096: Samajjato samaṃ kātuṃ, ghaṃsituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3098: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṃ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3099: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t:3102: Aghaṃsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṃ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3104: Sayaṃ dahati ce bhūmiṃ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3107: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṃ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3110: Ṭhapetuṃ bhikkhuno aggiṃ, bhūmiyaṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3113: Aggiṃ upari dārūnaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3114: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṃ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:3120: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3122: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṃ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t:3123: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṃ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3125: Puna taṃ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3139: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t:3143: Vikopentassa taṃ sabbaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3145: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3146: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṃ jalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3148: Udakena vinā cecca, taṃ panuddharituṃ jalā;
tika-vin10t:3149: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṃ.
tika-vin10t:3155: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3158: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3164: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t:3167: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t:3169: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t:3172: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṃ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t:3181: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṃ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3185: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t:3198: Vandākā vāpi aññaṃ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:3200: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṃ, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3204: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t:3206: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t:3207: Ghaṃsitvā pana taṃ tasmā, apanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3216: Sace taṃ makuḷaṃ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3218: Rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:3219: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3224: Pupphaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t:3227: Nāmetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, dātuṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3228: Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3233: Yesaṃ ruhati rukkhānaṃ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3239: ‘‘Rukkhaṃ chinda lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t:3242: ‘‘Ambaṃ jambumpi nimbaṃ vā, chinda bhinduddharā’’ti vā;
tika-vin10t:3245: ‘‘Imaṃ rukkhaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ challiṃ imaṃ lataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3246: Chinda bhindā’’ti vā vattuṃ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3249: Sabbameva kataṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t:3251: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t:3252: Kappiyaṃ karonto pana, dāruṃ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3254: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t:3255: Bhājanena samānattā, taṃ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3263: Kaṭāhaṃ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3264: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṃ taṃ, kāretabbaṃ tu kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3280: Kamme aropite cevaṃ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3299: Vadato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t:3305: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṃ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:3308: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3309: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3311: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t:3312: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3314: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t:3315: Ṭhapetuṃ tattha mañcādiṃ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3318: Mañcādiṃ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3320: Aññassatthāya yaṃ kiñci, santhataṃ yadi saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3321: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3323: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, ‘‘gacchā’’ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t:3329: Santhataṃ bhikkhunā taṃ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3330: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:3341: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t:3351: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṃ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3353: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t:3354: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3356: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t:3357: Tathā katvāpi taṃ sabbaṃ, gantuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3372: Etaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3376: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:3390: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṃ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t:3394: Yo pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ, jānaṃ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t:3398: Yāva taṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3406: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3416: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t:3425: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṃ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3426: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3429: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:3431: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t:3437: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t:3441: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:3460: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3462: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṃ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3466: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3471: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t:3481: Adhiṭṭheyyaṃ tato uddhaṃ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3482: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭaṃ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:3485: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t:3487: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṃ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3493: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t:3497: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3498: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:3500: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṃ, mattikaṃ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t:3506: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t:3513: Khayaṃ vā āvilattaṃ vā, jalaṃ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t:3541: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3557: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṃ bālaṃ, gilānaṃ gamikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3559: Adhamme pana kammasmiṃ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t:3563: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t:3565: Navakānaṃ vasā dvinnaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t:3568: ‘‘Osārehī’’ti vutto vā, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t:3584: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t:3616: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t:3635: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3647: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:3653: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṃ, cīvaraṃ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:3657: Cīvaraṃ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t:3660: Yaṃ vā nivāsituṃ sakkā, yaṃ vā pārupanūpagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3663: Sayaṃ sūciṃ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:3667: Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t:3670: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3672: ‘‘Yamettha cīvare kammaṃ, bhāro sabbaṃ tavā’’ti hi;
tika-vin10t:3673: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṃ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3679: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3692: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṃ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t:3695: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3737: Tathā saṃvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t:3744: Bhojanaṃ pañcadhā vuttaṃ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3756: Aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3772: Bhuñjitabbaṃ sakiṃ tattha, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3774: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3780: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3781: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t:3784: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3787: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṃ.
tika-vin10t:3794: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṃ.
tika-vin10t:3796: Yaṃ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṃ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t:3797: Bhojanaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, hoti aññataraṃ idha.
tika-vin10t:3800: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t:3805: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3806: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t:3811: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṃ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3812: Kāraṇanti na taṃ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t:3817: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t:3824: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā bhuñjataṃ tathā.
tika-vin10t:3833: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṃ, yāguādīsu taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3853: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t:3854: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṃ, bhojanaṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:3859: Yattha khīraṃ rasaṃ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3869: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3876: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3879: Tato ce uttariṃ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:3882: Gahitā pana pūvā’’ti, bhikkhuṃ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t:3885: Gaṇhatopi ca taṃ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3890: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t:3891: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t:3906: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṃsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:3909: Odano tattha sattannaṃ, dhaññānaṃ odano mato;
tika-vin10t:3915: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t:3921: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3924: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṃ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t:3927: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t:3928: Sace odhiṃ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3930: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṃ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t:3931: Odhiṃ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:3937: Odhiṃ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3940: ‘‘Yāguṃ gaṇhatha, yāgu’’nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3943: Taṃ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t:3954: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t:3955: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:3958: Koṭṭetvā denti taṃ cuṇṇaṃ, sattusaṅgahitaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:3960: Bhajjitānaṃ tu vīhīnaṃ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t:3961: Tesaṃ pana ca yaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, taṃ janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3967: Kuṇḍakaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3969: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t:3970: Khajjakaṃ pana suddhaṃ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3973: Yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ, na pavāreti suddhakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3979: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3984: Maṃsaṃ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3988: Nisedhaṃ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3991: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3994: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t:3996: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṃ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t:3997: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4004: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t:4007: Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4008: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4013: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṃ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4023: Pidahanto sakaṃ pattaṃ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4026: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4031: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4034: Samaṃsañhi rasaṃ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṃ vade;
tika-vin10t:4035: Taṃ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4040: Sace maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā, ‘‘gaṇha maṃsarasa’’nti vā;
tika-vin10t:4041: Vadeyyatthi ca maṃsaṃ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4049: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4055: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṃsakarambake;
tika-vin10t:4064: ‘‘Yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhā’’ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t:4065: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t:4067: Mandā yāgu, bahuṃ bhattaṃ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4068: Idaṃ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pana duddasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4070: Rasaṃ bahurase bhatte, khīraṃ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t:4071: Gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4076: Udakaṃ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4077: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tato puna.
tika-vin10t:4079: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:4082: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4083: Ito saṃsarituṃ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:4085: Tena mañcena naṃ saddhiṃ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t:4094: Kappiyaṃ pana kātabbaṃ, na patteyeva kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4095: Pacchiyaṃ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4103: Byañjanaṃ vāpi yaṃ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t:4105: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:4106: Yena taṃ akataṃ yaṃ vā, kātabbaṃ tena taṃ visuṃ.
tika-vin10t:4111: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṃ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4128: Jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t:4130: Dukkaṭaṃ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t:4154: Mūlaṃ kandaṃ muḷālañca, matthakaṃ khandhakaṃ tacaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4155: Pattaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṃ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t:4164: Saṅgahaṃ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṃ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t:4166: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṃ chetvā, yaṃ taṃ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t:4199: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4217: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t:4219: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t:4222: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t:4235: Tathā pupphaṃ karīrassa, pupphaṃ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4255: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4281: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t:4300: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:4301: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4304: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṃ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4307: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4321: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:4322: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4328: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t:4348: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṃ, iti kālattayaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4349: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṃ taṃ taṃ tu kālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4361: Gahitaṃ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṃ pubbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4364: Iti vuttaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4367: Taṃ taṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4379: Viññāpetvā tathā taṃ ce, dukkaṭaṃ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:4394: Yena yena hi viññattaṃ, tasmiṃ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t:4395: Laddhepi pana taṃ laddhaṃ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t:4403: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t:4420: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t:4422: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṃ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t:4425: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t:4429: Dātuṃ vāpi gahetuṃ vā, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4432: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4434: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4435: Sace yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4441: Tena hatthaṃ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṃ pana bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4443: Paṭicchitabbaṃ taṃ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4446: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ sabbaṃ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4447: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṃ, gahetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4450: Kājabhattaṃ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4452: Tiṃsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t:4455: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t:4456: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t:4459: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t:4461: Gahitaṃ tena taṃ sabbaṃ, hotiyeva na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:4464: Gahitaṃ hoti taṃ sabbaṃ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4465: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṃ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4467: Yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4468: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4474: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t:4477: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṃ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t:4485: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t:4488: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṃ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:4495: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4498: Sace rajaṃ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t:4500: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṃ, gahetuṃ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4503: Sāmaṇerassa taṃ datvā, dinnaṃ vā tena taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4504: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4506: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṃ, sarajaṃ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4507: ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ tvaṃ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4509: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4510: Rajaṃ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:4513: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t:4515: Patitaṃ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṃ rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4519: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4521: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4522: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4527: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4530: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṃ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4531: Uṇhattā pana taṃ heṭṭhā, gahetuṃ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t:4534: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t:4540: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4542: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṃ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t:4543: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4548: Tasmā taṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t:4549: Yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, gahetuṃ taṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4551: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4552: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4555: Paññāyati hi taṃ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4557: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ pacchā, khāditabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4558: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṃ, malaṃ vaṭṭati khādituṃ.
tika-vin10t:4563: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṃ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t:4564: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:4566: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṃ;
tika-vin10t:4570: Patte patati ce toyaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t:4573: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4575: Sattāhaṃ pana vassante, deve suddhaṃ jalaṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:4576: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṃ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4581: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṃ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t:4582: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṃ, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4588: Sace vadati pacchā taṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:4591: ‘‘Etto pūvampi bhattaṃ vā, kiñci gaṇhā’’ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t:4597: Taṃpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṃ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4606: Patitaṃ hatthato tasmiṃ, na karoti akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4609: Bhuñjitabbaṃ tu taṃ katvā, pattaṃ viya nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4611: Sace yāgukuṭaṃ puṇṇaṃ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t:4612: Bhikkhuṃ paṭiggahāpetuṃ, na sakkoti hi taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4617: Atha vā bhūmiyaṃyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:4618: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4621: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4624: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṃ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t:4630: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4633: Gaṇhitvā puna taṃ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṃ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4635: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṃ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t:4636: Tatheva taṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t:4638: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṃ na taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4639: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4645: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ tu, tasmiṃ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4647: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4651: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4653: Chinditvā ce vatiṃ ucchuṃ, phalaṃ vā deti gaṇhituṃ;
tika-vin10t:4656: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t:4659: Uddhaṃ hatthasataṃ gantvā, sampattaṃ puna taṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4662: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṃ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t:4663: Phalaṃ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4665: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṃ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4666: Phalaṃ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4668: Gahetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, chāyatthaṃ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:4669: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṃ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4674: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4678: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṃ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t:4686: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t:4690: Yāguṃ bhikkhussa taṃ datvā, sayaṃ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t:4698: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4702: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:4713: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t:4714: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:4716: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ yāguṃ, pātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4717: Sace pacati pacchā taṃ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t:4720: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṃ, phalaṃ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4723: Kaṇṭake bandhituṃ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4725: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4726: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṃ, bhasmaṃ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t:4731: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4734: Ucchuṃ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t:4735: ‘‘Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha’’, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:4746: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:4747: Kūpādīsu jalaṃ pātuṃ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4749: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:4750: Sanditvā yadi taṃ gantvā, nadiṃ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4753: Na ñāyati raso tesaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4756: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4762: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t:4764: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṃ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t:4768: Semhaṃ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4770: Yaṃ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:4771: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4812: Udakaṃ dantaponaṃ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t:4813: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṃ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t:4822: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4832: Pamāṇaṃ savane cevaṃ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t:4842: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4851: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t:4857: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:4858: Vattabbaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vuttaṃ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t:4864: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t:4867: Cārittaṃ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t:4876: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṃ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t:4879: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t:4880: Natthi ārocane kiccaṃ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t:4882: Na doso samaye santaṃ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t:4883: Bhikkhuṃ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṃ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t:4888: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:4896: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, ‘‘rogo dāni na me’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4902: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4912: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t:4917: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṃpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t:4918: Evaṃ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4921: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t:4924: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4932: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, sampattaṃ pana passati;
tika-vin10t:4939: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṃ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t:4949: Uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4955: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t:4960: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t:4961: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4964: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4996: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t:4998: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5004: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5007: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t:5010: Pājentopi sace nāvaṃ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:5011: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṃ kīḷati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5013: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t:5016: Udakaṃ kañjikaṃ vāpi, cikkhallaṃ vāpi vikkhipaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5048: Disvā vā pana taṃ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t:5049: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:5058: Jotiṃ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t:5059: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṃ tu paccayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5061: Sayaṃ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t:5071: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṃ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:5077: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṃ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t:5084: Dukkaṭaṃ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t:5093: Cīvaraṃ yaṃ nivāsetuṃ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t:5097: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:5102: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5103: Ekaṃ vāpi anekaṃ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5108: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṃ, tena saṃsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t:5119: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṃ, nidhetuṃ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t:5128: Yassa kassaci nāmaṃ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5133: ‘‘Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṃ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t:5140: Puna tenapi vattabbaṃ, ‘‘ko te mitto’’ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5145: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṃ, santakaṃ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t:5146: Vissajjehī’’ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:5148: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5152: Yena taṃ vinayaṃ kammaṃ, kataṃ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5204: Dhovato pana pattaṃ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t:5206: Hatthena taṃ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:5207: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5219: Siñcane siñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, paribhoge idaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5221: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t:5229: Vadatā pana taṃ kammaṃ, uccāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5231: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:5237: ‘‘Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t:5238: Kata’’nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t:5248: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t:5250: Evaṃ satampi bhikkhūnaṃ, sahassampi ca tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:5251: Āpajjateva āpattiṃ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t:5263: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṃ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t:5273: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, sesānaṃ hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5281: Muñcitvā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t:5282: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:5284: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṃ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:5285: Pariyesati pattaṃ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5288: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5301: Maggaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ yo, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5303: Gamane saṃvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t:5304: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṃ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:5323: Kammaṃ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t:5329: Tikkhattuṃ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t:5330: ‘‘Mā hevaṃ avacāyasmā’’, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t:5333: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5343: Saṃvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t:5345: Uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t:5349: Dadatopi tathā ekaṃ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t:5351: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṃ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5352: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t:5361: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṃ diṭṭhiṃ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t:5367: Tathā vināsitaṃ jānaṃ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t:5377: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ uttānamevidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5381: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t:5411: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:5416: Evaṃ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t:5417: Tasmiṃ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t:5429: Kuddho deti pahāraṃ ce, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5432: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṃ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t:5433: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5436: Kaṇṇaṃ vā tassa nāsaṃ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5444: Pahāraṃ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5450: Iti vatvā panāyantaṃ, ‘‘gaccha re’’ti ca muggaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5451: Satthaṃ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t:5453: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t:5460: Kāyaṃ vā kāyabaddhaṃ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5463: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5466: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5467: Hatthādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, aṅgaṃ bhijjati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5486: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5493: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṃ, mā eva’’nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t:5499: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t:5502: ‘‘Yaṃ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī’’ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5521: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5522: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t:5528: Ime kammaṃ karontī’’ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:5535: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṃ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t:5537: Etasmiṃ antare kammaṃ, kopetuṃ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t:5540: Adatvā jahite chandaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5541: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5546: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:5553: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṃ datvāna cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5554: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t:5557: Tikapācittiyaṃ dhamma- kamme vuttaṃ tu cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:5580: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:5581: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t:5602: Sace kappiyavatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vāpi akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5609: ‘‘Na vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā taṃ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t:5612: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5631: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:5633: Atha sambahulā gāmaṃ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t:5636: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5637: Puna āpucchane kiccaṃ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t:5640: Pavisanti sace aññaṃ, pucchitabbaṃ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t:5642: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṃ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t:5643: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t:5645: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t:5646: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5648: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṃ, bhikkhuṃ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t:5654: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5674: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5679: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t:5686: Navaṃ mañcampi pīṭhaṃ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5693: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5699: Uttānaṃ vāpi aṭṭaṃ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5702: Mañcaṃ vā pana pīṭhaṃ vā, tūlonaddhaṃ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t:5708: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t:5716: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:5734: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5739: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t:5742: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:5749: Yo cantaragharaṃ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t:5750: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:5758: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5759: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:5765: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:5782: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5798: Anāpattittano bhattaṃ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t:5799: Tathā aññassa bhattaṃ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t:5801: Yaṃ na dinnaṃ taṃ dāpeti, na dinnaṃ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:5802: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṃ, samaṃ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:5818: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5824: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṃ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t:5826: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5829: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5830: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5832: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t:5837: Ārāmaṃ upacāraṃ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t:5843: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṃ katvā bahuṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5845: Yāguyā viditaṃ katvā, pūvaṃ bhattaṃ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t:5849: Haranti tena saddhiṃ ce, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t:5854: Yaṃ asaṃviditaṃ katvā, ābhataṃ pana taṃ bahi;
tika-vin10t:5857: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5882: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṃ, tato ūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5888: Ubho koṇe samaṃ katvā, sādaraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5892: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5895: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5898: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t:5903: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t:5906: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t:5909: Hatthaṃ vā pana pādaṃ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5916: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṃ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t:5919: Yo anādariyaṃ katvā, olokento tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:5941: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t:5943: Kāyaṃ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5950: Khambhaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5951: Dukkaṭaṃ muninā vuttaṃ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:5956: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t:5974: Yaṃ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5977: Sese thūpīkataṃ sabbaṃ, vaṭṭateva na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:5979: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5980: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5983: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5986: Dinnaṃ ayāvakālittā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5989: Piṇḍapātaṃ sace denti, idaṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5991: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṃ vā, thālakaṃ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:5994: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṃ tu sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5998: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vutta-nayaṃ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t:6001: Aññesaṃ attano bhattaṃ, ākiraṃ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t:6005: Catutthe yaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, vuttaṃ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t:6012: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṃ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6016: Viññattiyaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6017: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t:6039: Mukhe ca sakalaṃ hatthaṃ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6040: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṃ katvā, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6042: Vacanaṃ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṃ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t:6046: Vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ce, kathetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6050: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6061: Katvā evaṃ na bhottabbaṃ, saddaṃ ‘‘suru surū’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t:6062: Hatthanillehakaṃ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:6064: Phāṇitaṃ ghanayāguṃ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṃ;
tika-vin10t:6071: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6075: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṃ vāpi thālakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6077: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6085: Chattaṃ yaṃ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t:6094: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṃ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:6097: Dhanuṃ sarena saddhiṃ vā, dhanuṃ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6101: Sace deseti saddhammaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6104: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṃ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6112: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6115: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t:6117: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṃ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6120: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6134: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6137: Pañhaṃ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6142: Gacchato purato pañhaṃ, na vattabbaṃ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t:6145: Saddhiṃ uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6153: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t:6156: Jīvarukkhassa yaṃ mūlaṃ, dissamānaṃ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t:6157: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṃ, sabbaṃ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t:6165: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṃ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6166: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6172: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
tika-vin10t:6213: Chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ, paṭiseveyya yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6214: Hoti pārājikā nāma, samaṇī sā pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:6226: Sarīrakena ce tena, phuseyya bhikkhunī pana.
tika-vin10t:6229: Sarīramassa tena vā, phuṭṭhā pārājikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6237: Avasesena vā tassa, kāyaṃ kāyena attano;
tika-vin10t:6238: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassā, payoge purisassa ca.
tika-vin10t:6244: Avasese ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6247: Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi, gataṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6249: Kelāyati sace bhikkhu, saddhiṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6255: Bhikkhuno methuno rāgo, gehapemampi vā bhave;
tika-vin10t:6256: Tassā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6258: Ubhinnaṃ methune rāge, gehapemepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6261: Yassa yattha manosuddhaṃ, tassa tattha na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:6265: Pacchā dūseti ce neva, hoti bhikkhunidūsako.
tika-vin10t:6268: Niccalo hoti ce bhikkhu, na hotāpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:6270: Bhikkhunī bhikkhunā phuṭṭhā, sace hotipi niccalā;
tika-vin10t:6276: Tassā kriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sati na dissati;
tika-vin10t:6286: Pārājikattaṃ jānanti, saliṅge tu ṭhitāya hi;
tika-vin10t:6289: Dhure nikkhittamattasmiṃ, sā ca pārājikā siyā;
tika-vin10t:6293: Viseso tatra pācitti, idha pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6297: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko ca so tassā, diṭṭhiyā gahaṇena taṃ.
tika-vin10t:6299: Anuvatteyya yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī sā visumpi ca;
tika-vin10t:6302: Acajantīva taṃ vatthuṃ, gahetvā yadi tiṭṭhati;
tika-vin10t:6306: Puna appaṭisandheyā, dvidhā bhinnā silā viya.
tika-vin10t:6321: Sallapeyya tathā tattha, ṭhatvā tu purisena vā;
tika-vin10t:6322: Saṅketaṃ vāpi gaccheyya, iccheyyā gamanassa vā.
tika-vin10t:6325: Upasaṃhareyya kāyaṃ vā, hatthapāse ṭhitā pana.
tika-vin10t:6330: Anulomena vā vatthuṃ, paṭilomena vā cutā;
tika-vin10t:6333: Athādito panekaṃ vā, dve vā tīṇipi satta vā;
tika-vin10t:6362: Sakkhiṃ vāpi sahāyaṃ vā, pariyesati dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6363: Pade pade tathā aṭṭaṃ, kātuṃ gacchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:6365: Āroceti sace pubbaṃ, bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6366: Disvā vohārikaṃ tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6368: Āroceti sace pacchā, itaro attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6371: Ārocetitaro pubbaṃ, sace so attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6381: Vinicchaye kate tehi, aṭṭe pana ca niṭṭhite.
tika-vin10t:6386: Dūtaṃ vāpi pahiṇitvā, āgantvāna sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6389: Ārāme pana aññehi, anācāraṃ kataṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:6390: Anodissa paraṃ kiñci, rakkhaṃ yācati tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6392: Yāya kiñci avuttāva, dhammaṭṭhā sayameva tu;
tika-vin10t:6393: Sutvā taṃ aññato aṭṭaṃ, niṭṭhāpenti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:6399: Jānantī bhikkhunī coriṃ, vajjhaṃ viditameva yā;
tika-vin10t:6411: Vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā coriṃ, ṭhapetvā kappamevidaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6414: Sammannati ca sīmaṃ vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6415: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi ca dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6418: Gaṇo ācarinī ceva, na ca muccati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6421: Kappaṃ vā apaloketvā, tassā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:6428: Ohīyeyya gaṇamhā vā, rattiṃ vippavaseyya vā.
tika-vin10t:6433: Nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6442: Nikkhamitvā sace pacchā, sakaṃ gāmaṃ visantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6443: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, vaticchiddena vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:6446: Kappiyanti paviṭṭhattā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6448: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihārassa, bhūmi tāsaṃ tu kappiyā;
tika-vin10t:6454: Yaṃ kiñci sakagāmaṃ vā, paragāmampi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:6458: Pāraṃ gacchati yā tīraṃ, tassā samaṇiyā pana.
tika-vin10t:6469: Nhāyituṃ pivituṃ vāpi, otiṇṇātha nadiṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6475: Setunā upagantvā vā, yānākāsehi vā sace;
tika-vin10t:6476: Yāti uttaraṇe kāle, padasā garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:6481: Piṭṭhiyaṃ vā nisīditvā, khandhe vā uttarantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6491: Na doso dutiyā pāsaṃ, uṭṭheti aruṇaṃ sace.
tika-vin10t:6494: Gāmato bahi nikkhamma, tassā dutiyikāya tu.
tika-vin10t:6514: Dvinnaṃ maggaṃ gacchantīnaṃ, ekā gantuṃ no sakkoti;
tika-vin10t:6518: Hoti tassāpi āpatti, saussāhā na hoti ce.
tika-vin10t:6520: Gacchantīsu tathā dvīsu, purimā yāti ekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6521: Aññaṃ pana sace maggaṃ, pacchimāpi ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:6532: Pakkantā vāpi vibbhantā, yātā petānaṃ lokaṃ vā;
tika-vin10t:6533: Pakkhasaṅkantā vā naṭṭhā, saddhiṃ yātā sā ce hoti.
tika-vin10t:6539: Agāmake araññe tu, gaṇā ohīyanaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6542: Cattāropi ca saṅghādi-sesā tassā na vijjare.
tika-vin10t:6549: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi, honti thullaccayā duve.
tika-vin10t:6554: Pucchitvā kārakaṃ saṅghaṃ, chandaṃ datvā gaṇassa vā;
tika-vin10t:6555: Vatte vā pana vattantiṃ, asante kārakepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6557: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ukkhittaṃ, yā osāreti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6579: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, sabbatthāpi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6582: ‘‘Avassuto na cāya’’nti, ñatvā gaṇhati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6600: ‘‘Nāvassuto’’ti ñatvā vā, kupitā vā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:6601: Kulānuddayatā vāpi, uyyojeti ca yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6611: Navame dasame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6616: Yāvatatiyakā aṭṭha, cattāri ca ito tato.
tika-vin10t:6633: Akāle cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, dinnaṃ kālepi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:6637: Bhājāpeyya ca yā tassā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6639: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ yaṃ, taṃ tu nissaggiyaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:6642: Katvā vinayakammaṃ tu, paṭiladdhampi taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6643: Tassa cāyamadhippāyo, sevituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6656: Itaresu ca vatthūnaṃ, payogassa vasā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6661: Tāya vā dīyamānaṃ tu, tassā vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6671: Tasmiṃ taññeva vā aññaṃ, aññenatthepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6678: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā pubbaṃ, pacchā aññaṃ cetāpeyya;
tika-vin10t:6679: Evaṃ saññāyaññaṃ dhaññaṃ, mayhaṃ ānetvā detīti.
tika-vin10t:6682: Lābhe nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tena caññena vābhataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6691: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, lābhe, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:6701: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6712: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:6726: Tato ce uttariṃ yaṃ tu, cetāpeti hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6740: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi khādati;
tika-vin10t:6743: Dve tayo bhaṇḍike saddhiṃ, saṅkhāditvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6744: Ajjhoharati yā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6746: Bhinditvā tattha ekekaṃ, miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6755: Ekā miñjā palaṇḍussa, bhañjanassa duve siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:6768: Na doso sati ābādhe, lomake saṃharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6775: Gaṇḍaṃ tattha vaṇaṃ vāpi, na doso paharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6786: Pavesāpeti vā tasmiṃ, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6798: Catunnaṃ vāpi tissannaṃ, ekapabbampi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6811: Bhuñjato pana bhikkhussa, pānīyaṃ vā vidhūpanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6821: Khādato khādanaṃ vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6823: Na doso deti dāpeti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
