tika-vin10t:6827: Viññatvā āmakaṃ dhaññaṃ, bhajjitvā yadi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6828: Koṭṭetvā ca pacitvā ca, pācitti paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:6830: Na kevalaṃ tu dhaññānaṃ, gahaṇeyeva dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6831: Haraṇepi ca dhaññānaṃ, tathā sukkhāpane pana.
tika-vin10t:6840: Viññatvā vā sayaṃ tasmā, bhajjanādīni aññato.
tika-vin10t:6843: Kārāpetvāpi katvā vā, ajjhoharati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6848: Bhajjanādīni katvā vā, kārāpetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:6851: Viññattiyā panaññāya, laddhaṃ tāya sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6858: Ñātakānampi dhaññaṃ tu, āmakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6864: Uccāraṃ vāpi passāvaṃ, saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6865: Chaḍḍeyya vā tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:6867: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, pākārepi ayaṃ nayo;
tika-vin10t:6876: Sabbattha pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6877: Avalañjepi vā ṭhāne, oloketvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:6883: Khette vā nāḷikerādi-ārāme vāpi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6886: Tāni cattāri vatthūni, sace chaḍḍeti vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6889: Bhuñjamānā nisīditvā, khette tu harite tathā;
tika-vin10t:6890: Ucchuādīni khādantī, gacchantī pana tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6892: Chaḍḍeti yadi ucchiṭṭhaṃ, udakaṃ calakāni vā;
tika-vin10t:6893: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6899: Na uṭṭhetaṅkuraṃ yāva, sabbesaṃ tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6901: Lāyitampi manussānaṃ, khettaṃ rakkhati ce puna;
tika-vin10t:6904: Na doso chaḍḍite khette, sabbaṃ chaḍḍentiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6908: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6915: Suṇāti tesaṃ gītampi, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:6917: Aññasmimpi disābhāge, naccaṃ passati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:6918: Suṇāti aññato gītaṃ, visuṃ pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:6921: Naccituṃ gāyituṃ neva, sayaṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6923: ‘‘Aññaṃ naccāti vādehi’’, iti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6926: Tassā pācitti sabbattha, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6930: Ārāmeyeva ṭhatvā vā, yā passati suṇāti vā.
tika-vin10t:6932: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, āgantvā ca payojitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6933: Gantvā passantiyā vāpi, tathārūpā hi kāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:6935: Passantiyā tathā maggaṃ, naccaṃ paṭipathepi ca;
tika-vin10t:6944: Santiṭṭhati sace saddhiṃ, purisena ca bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6946: Tassā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, saddhiṃ vā sallapantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6949: Hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā vā, purisassa sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6952: Santiṭṭhati ca yā tassā, dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6953: Anāpatti sace koci, dutiyā viññu vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6960: Adhikaṃ itaraṃ sabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6970: Atikkameti yā, hoti, dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pade;
tika-vin10t:6971: Dutiye ca pade tassā, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t:6987: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ tulyaṃ, aṭṭhame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7005: Dvīsu tesu panekekaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu karontiyā.
tika-vin10t:7021: Dutiye pana vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7026: Anantarāya taṃ pacchā, yā na sibbeyya bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:7031: Pacchā sibbati pācitti, nikkhipitvā dhuraṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:7044: Ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā, pañca pañcasu dīpitā;
tika-vin10t:7064: Yā hi bhikkhuni saṅghassa, labhitabbaṃ tu cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:7067: Gaṇassāpi ca ekissā, lābhe āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7090: Gaṇanāya vasenettha, cīvarānaṃ tu tā pana;
tika-vin10t:7101: Ubhosu kaṅkhitāya vā, avoca dukkaṭaṃ jino.
tika-vin10t:7119: Sesaṃ pana asesena, sattamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7124: Ekāya tu nipannāya, aparā vā nipajjatu;
tika-vin10t:7125: Nipajjeyyuṃ saheva dve, dvinnaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7128: Ekāya ca nipannāya, sace ekā nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:7130: Ubho vāpi nisīdanti, samaṃ, ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7137: Nipajjanti saheva dve, tāsaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7138: Ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ dvinnaṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7155: Na ca aphāsukāmāya, āpucchā purato pana;
tika-vin10t:7173: Sayaṃ upassayā tamhā, nikkaḍḍhati sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7176: Taṃ nikkaḍḍhantiyā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7191: Chaṭṭhe panidha vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7201: Na doso saha satthena, khemaṭṭhānāpadāsu vā;
tika-vin10t:7205: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, anuttānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:7210: Katvā ca dhuranikkhepaṃ, pacchā gacchantiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7213: Chasu vattabbamevatthi, kinnu nāmidha taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7215: Tīṇi gantvā ca teneva, paccāgantuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7232: Niddiṭṭhaṃ muninā tāsaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade;
tika-vin10t:7236: Gantvā passanti ce taṃ taṃ, pāṭekkāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7239: Bhikkhussa pana sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7245: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā, māṇanātītaṃ vāḷūpetaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7257: Channaṃ aññataraṃ suttaṃ, yadi kantati bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:7258: Yattakaṃ añchitaṃ hatthā, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
tika-vin10t:7263: Na doso kantitaṃ suttaṃ, puna kantantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7267: Koṭṭanaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ tu, ādiṃ katvāna dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7274: Kiñci kammaṃ akāretvā, kiñci kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7276: Saṅghassa yāgupāne vā, saṅghabhattepi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7279: Attano ca anāpatti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7284: Tathā idha panekāhaṃ, parihāro na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:7291: Gihīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, dantaponodakaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7293: Ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ aññaṃ, aññesaṃ tu dadāti yā;
tika-vin10t:7297: Yā na deti ca dāpeti, nikkhamitvāpi dentiyā.
tika-vin10t:7299: Deti bāhiralepaṃ vā, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7304: Divase tu catutthe taṃ, dhovitvā puna cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:7309: Tassā nissajjite tasmiṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7310: Utunīnaṃ abhāve tu, aññāsaṃ puna pariyaye.
tika-vin10t:7319: Attano gāmato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7335: Pariyāpuṇeyya ce kiñci, yassa kassaci santike;
tika-vin10t:7338: Lekhe pana anāpatti, dhāraṇāya ca guttiyā;
tika-vin10t:7339: Parittesu ca sabbesu, tathā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7342: Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ, navamena samaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7354: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:7357: Jātakaṅkhāya vā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7360: Tā sannipatitā yattha, tāsaṃ gacchati santikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7369: Akkoseyya ca yā bhikkhuṃ, paribhāseyya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7378: Yā saṅghaṃ paribhāseyya, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7379: Ekaṃ sambahulā vāpi, tatheva itarāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7385: Nimantitāpi vā sace, pavāritāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7389: Yā cajjhoharaṇatthāya, yaṃ kiñci pana āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7391: Paṭiggaṇhāti ce tassā, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7402: Kālikāni ca tīṇeva, paccaye sati bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:7406: Nimantitā anāpucchā, sāmiṃ bhuñjati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:7408: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, akāretvāpi vā yadi;
tika-vin10t:7409: Paribhuñjati yā tassā, pācitti kriyato siyā.
tika-vin10t:7415: Santaṃ bhāsantiyā dosaṃ, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7420: Na vasati sace maggo, akhemo vā sace siyā.
tika-vin10t:7422: Ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma, āvāso pana tattha hi;
tika-vin10t:7425: Pakkantā pakkhasaṅkantā, vibbhantā vā matāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7440: Pariyesitvāpi vā bhikkhuṃ, na doso alabhantiyā;
tika-vin10t:7452: Iccevaṃ pana nikkhitte, dhure pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7461: Pasākhe pana sañjātaṃ, gaṇḍaṃ rucitameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7462: Anāpucchāva saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ ekena ekikā.
tika-vin10t:7465: Katesu dukkaṭāniccha, tassā pācittiyo cha ca.
tika-vin10t:7467: ‘‘Yamettha atthi kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t:7468: Āṇāpeti sace evaṃ, so ca sabbaṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:7470: Ekāya pana vācāya, dukkaṭāni panaccha ca;
tika-vin10t:7473: Bhedanādīsu ekaṃ sā, āṇāpeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:7474: So karoti ca sabbāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7476: Āpucchitvāpi vā viññuṃ, gahetvā dutiyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7488: Tathā gabbhinisaññāya, na ca gabbhiniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:7497: Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7502: Dve vassāni siyāpatti, vuṭṭhāpeyya sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7507: Chasu sikkhitasikkhaṃ yā, dve vassāni akhaṇḍato;
tika-vin10t:7510: Imā hi cha ca sikkhāyo, saṭṭhivassāpi ce pana;
tika-vin10t:7511: Pabbajjāya padātabbā, adatvā na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:7514: Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ, idha saṅghena sammataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7521: Paṭhamena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, catutthaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7528: Asesena ca sesaṃ tu, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7532: Sattamampi tathā sabbaṃ, catutthena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7536: Vuttaṃ tena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ na visesatā.
tika-vin10t:7539: Dve vassāni ca yā kāci, vuṭṭhāpitapavattiniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7552: Vuṭṭhāpetvā tu yā kāci, bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7553: Taṃ gahetvā na gaccheyya, na caññaṃ āṇāpeyya ce.
tika-vin10t:7566: Yā mahūpapadā dve tu, sikkhamānā panādito;
tika-vin10t:7569: Sace gihigatā honti, na ca vā purisaṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:7573: Vattabbā panubhopetā, evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7578: Yā aṭṭhārasavassā tu, tato paṭṭhāya sā pana;
tika-vin10t:7595: Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthaṃ pañcamampi ca;
tika-vin10t:7606: Laddhe ca cīvare pacchā, asante antarāyike;
tika-vin10t:7623: Mātarā pitarā vātha, nānuññātaṃ tu sāminā;
tika-vin10t:7627: Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ tu, bhikkhunīhi, na bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:7643: Dvādase terase vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7652: Divasampi ca dhāreti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7655: Chattameva ca dhārentī, yadi gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7661: Puna dhārentiyā tassā, hoti pācittiyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:7677: Yā ca dhāreyya saṅghāṇiṃ, yaṃ kiñcipi kaṭūpiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7690: Dhāreti pana yaṃ kiñci, sace sīsūpagādisu;
tika-vin10t:7691: Tassā tassa ca vatthussa, gaṇanāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7693: Ābādhapaccayā doso, kiñci dhārentiyā na ca;
tika-vin10t:7703: Sesaṃ tu tatiyeneva, sadisaṃ sabbathā mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7726: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7731: Vinaye ca katokāsaṃ, suttaṃ pucchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:7740: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:7743: Yassā saṃkaccikaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acchinnaṃ vāpi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:7753: Agilānā sace sappiṃ, laddhaṃ viññattiyā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7770: Bhuñjantiyā tu viññatvā, aṭṭhasupi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7774: Sekhiyā pana ye dhammā, uddiṭṭhā pañcasattati;
tika-vin10t:7788: Suṇanti vinaye hi te ye hite;
tika-vin10t:7818: Pabbājeti sace taṃ so, sayamevāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7820: Sāmaṇeropi vattabbo, daharo natthi tattha ce;
tika-vin10t:7826: Purisaṃ bhikkhuto añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7827: Itthiṃ bhikkhunito añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7829: Sāmaṇeropi vā dātuṃ, sāmaṇerīpi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7832: Sayameva ca yaṃ kiñci, pabbājentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:7836: Sarīre pīḷakā vāpi, kacchu vā tassa honti ce.
tika-vin10t:7838: Mātā yathā niyaṃputtaṃ, na jigucchati sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:7853: Atha hatthepi vā tassa, adatvā sayameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:7856: Nivāseti anāṇatto, so pārupati vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7857: Apanetvā tato sabbaṃ, puna dātabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t:7859: Bhikkhunā tu sahatthena, tathā āṇattiyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7860: Dinnaṃ vaṭṭati kāsāvaṃ, nādinnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7862: Tasseva santakaṃ vāpi, kā kathā attasantake;
tika-vin10t:7868: Sace ekapadaṃ vāpi, deti ekakkharampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7869: Paṭipāṭiṃ virajjhitvā, gahitaṃ ce na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7871: Tikkhattuṃ yadi vā deti, buddhaṃ saraṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7872: Tathā sesesu cevampi, na dinnāneva honti hi.
tika-vin10t:7878: Na hoti pana pabbajjā, ubhatosuddhiyā vinā.
tika-vin10t:7894: Dātabbaṃ tassa kālena, sace yāgu bhavissati.
tika-vin10t:7899: Cīvare yāni vattāni, vuttāni hi mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:7920: Ekekassa ubhinnaṃ vā, nālaye sati bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:7926: Yācitassa na dosova, vasituṃ nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7957: Tathā kaṇṇikakeso vā, thūlakesopi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7971: Tathā ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo vā, pūtikaṇṇopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7980: Niccavissavanāso vā, yo vā pana mahāmukho;
tika-vin10t:7993: Sukhumova ṭhito, taṃ ce, pabbājetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8010: Vikaṭo vāpi paṇho vā, tathā ubbaddhapiṇḍiko.
tika-vin10t:8013: Tathā piṭṭhikapādo vā, mahāpaṇhipi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8015: Vaṅkapādo naro yo vā, gaṇṭhikaṅgulikopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8022: ‘‘Sāmaṇerajja mā khāda, mā bhuñja ca pivā’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t:8031: Yāguṃ vā pana bhattaṃ vā, dassetvā kira bhāsituṃ;
tika-vin10t:8040: Udakaṃ vā pavesetuṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8050: Vāritā yassa pabbajjā, nāsetabboti so mato;
tika-vin10t:8051: Tividhe pana te ñatvā, pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8057: Sayameva ca yo tattha, pabbajitvā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:8061: Yo ca pabbajito hutvā, bhikkhuvassāni gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:8070: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccati’’.
tika-vin10t:8077: Hoti titthiyapakkanto, liṅge tesaṃ tu nissite.
tika-vin10t:8085: Morapiñchādikaṃ tesaṃ, liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti vā sace;
tika-vin10t:8086: Sārato ceva vā tesaṃ, pabbajjaṃ laddhimeva vā.
tika-vin10t:8095: Nāgo vāpi supaṇṇo vā, yakkho sakkopi vā idha;
tika-vin10t:8103: Dūsetvā pana so neva, bhikkhunīdūsako siyā.
tika-vin10t:8106: Labhateva ca pabbajjaṃ, sā ca neva parājitā.
tika-vin10t:8110: Karoto dukkaṭaṃ hoti, na kuppati sace kataṃ.
tika-vin10t:8113: Sesesupi ayaṃ ñeyyo, nayo sabbattha viññunā.
tika-vin10t:8119: Apatto tesamosāro, kato ce pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8127: Osāretvā kataṃ kammaṃ, na ca kuppati kappati.
tika-vin10t:8134: Anupubbena sāvetvā, tesaṃ nāmaṃ tu tena ca;
tika-vin10t:8135: Ekato anusāvetvā, katampi ca na kuppati.
tika-vin10t:8149: Nimittena nimittaṃ tu, ghaṭetvā pana sammatā.
tika-vin10t:8152: Baddhā nāma siyā sīmā, sā tisampattisaṃyutā.
tika-vin10t:8155: Iti baddhā tidhā vuttā, abaddhāpi tidhā matā.
tika-vin10t:8160: Jātassare samudde vā, nadiyā vā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8169: Imā dve pana sīmāyo, vaḍḍhanti parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:8176: Tasmā so hatthapāse vā, kātabbo bahi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8179: Ñatvā pamāṇaṃ sodhetvā, sīmaṃ bandheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:8184: Pabbataṃ vanaṃ pāsāṇaṃ, rukkhaṃ maggañca vammikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8187: Tesu tīṇi nimittāni, ādiṃ katvā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8218: Saṅghassa pātimokkho ca, pārisuddhi gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin10t:8224: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca viññunā;
tika-vin10t:8235: Uddisante samappā vā, āgacchanti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:8236: Uddiṭṭhaṃ taṃ suuddiṭṭhaṃ, sāvetabbaṃ tu sesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8239: Pārisuddhi tu kattabbā, mūle tesaṃ, sace bahū.
tika-vin10t:8248: No ce adhiṭṭhaheyyassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8251: Tathā dhammena vaggena, samaggena ca dhammato.
tika-vin10t:8259: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8265: Dhammena pana vaggo hi, katamo so uposatho;
tika-vin10t:8268: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8276: Vagge samagge vaggoti, saññino vimatissa vā;
tika-vin10t:8289: Uposatho na kātabbo, dine vā anuposathe.
tika-vin10t:8292: Āvāso vā anāvāso, na gantabbo kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8312: Dasavaggena abbhānaṃ, vinā sabbaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8314: Kammaṃ vīsativaggena, na kattabbaṃ na kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8318: Catuvaggena kattabbe, sesesu ca ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:8324: Katvā pana karontānaṃ, tathā, sesaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8335: Ajjhokāsepi vā vassaṃ, upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8346: Diṭṭhiṃ vā tassa kukkuccaṃ, vinodessāmahanti vā.
tika-vin10t:8352: Dhammassa savanatthāya, gantuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8355: Iccevaṃ katikā pubbaṃ, katā ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8370: Sace pāpuṇituṃ gacchaṃ, na sakkoteva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8372: Vaje satthepi nāvāyaṃ, tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8378: Yena kenantarāyena, vassaṃ nopagato hi yo;
tika-vin10t:8381: Vassaṃ anupagantvā vā, tadaheva ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:8382: Bahiddhā eva sattāhaṃ, upagantvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8384: Vītināmeti ce tassa, purimāpi na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:8385: Paṭissave ca bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8387: Vassaṃ panupagantvā ca, uṭṭhāpetvā na cāruṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8390: Antoyeva ca sattāhaṃ, nivattantassa tassa tu;
tika-vin10t:8391: Anāpattīti ko vādo, vasitvā bahi gacchato.
tika-vin10t:8396: Gahitaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti, chinnavasso na hoti so;
tika-vin10t:8397: Labhateva pavāretuṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8400: Nicchārite ca tikkhattuṃ, vassaṃ upagato siyā.
tika-vin10t:8402: Ādiṃ tu navamiṃ katvā, gantuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8403: Āgacchatu ca pacchā so, mā vā doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8408: Tevācī dvekavācī ca, saṅghe ca gaṇapuggale.
tika-vin10t:8410: Etā pana munindena, vuttā nava pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:8414: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā saṅghena, kattabbā hi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:8417: Sayaṃ yāva pavāreyya, tāva ukkuṭikañhi so.
tika-vin10t:8419: Ñattiṃ vatvā pavāreyyuṃ, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8422: Aññamaññaṃ pavāreyyuṃ, vinā ñattiṃ duve janā;
tika-vin10t:8428: Pañca yasmiṃ panāvāse, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8443: Chandaṃ vā pārisuddhiṃ vā, gahetvā vā pavāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8446: Sace so saṅghamappatvā, vibbhameyya mareyya vā;
tika-vin10t:8447: Nāhaṭañceva taṃ sabbaṃ, patvā cevaṃ siyāhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8449: Saṅghaṃ patvā pamatto vā, sutto vā khittacittako;
tika-vin10t:8473: Na ca vaṭṭanti morassa, piñchena parisibbitā.
tika-vin10t:8476: Ajinassa ca cammena, na vaṭṭati parikkhaṭā.
tika-vin10t:8478: Puṭādiṃ apanetvā vā, chinditvā vāpi sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:8481: Sabbāpi pana dhāretuṃ, na ca vaṭṭanti pādukā;
tika-vin10t:8487: Gonakaṃ kuttakaṃ cittaṃ, paṭikaṃ paṭalikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8496: Heṭṭhā akappiye paccatthare sati na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8499: Āsandiṃ pana pallaṅkaṃ, ṭhapetvā tūlikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8500: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, labhate gihisantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8510: Saṅghassa santakaṃ gehaṃ, santakaṃ bhikkhunopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8516: Sā hi sammutikā nāma, yā hi saṅghena sammatā;
tika-vin10t:8532: Ettha pakkañca vutthañca, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8540: Bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ, hatthato ca paṭiggaho;
tika-vin10t:8541: Tesañca sannidhi anto- vuttaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8543: Bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā, santakaṃ saṅghikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:8544: Antovutthañca pakkañca, ubhinnaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8550: Pakkaṃ taṃ pana sattāhaṃ, vaṭṭateva nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8562: Honti dosakarā bhuttā, abhuttaṃ tatiyampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8564: Ambaṃ jambu ca cocañca, mocañca madhu muddikā;
tika-vin10t:8571: Pacchā parissavaṃ katvā, pātuṃ vaṭṭati pānakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8579: Sabbo puppharaso vutto, madhukassa rasaṃ vinā;
tika-vin10t:8623: Kathinassa ca kiṃ mūlaṃ, kiṃ vatthu kā ca bhūmiyo;
tika-vin10t:8626: Mūlamekaṃ, siyā vatthu, tividhaṃ, bhūmiyo cha ca;
tika-vin10t:8629: Saṅgho mūlanti niddiṭṭhaṃ, vatthu hoti ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8630: Khomādīni cha vuttāni, cīvarāni cha bhūmiyo.
tika-vin10t:8635: Dhovanañca vicāro ca, chedanaṃ bandhanampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8642: Savanāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā.
tika-vin10t:8648: Gantvā pana vihāraṃ so, aññaṃ sukhavihārikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8650: Tattha taṃ viharantova, karoti yadi cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8657: Karontasseva naṭṭhaṃ vā, daḍḍhaṃ vā nāsanantikā.
tika-vin10t:8665: Puna vutte ‘‘na sakkomi, dātunti tava cīvaraṃ’’;
tika-vin10t:8681: Tayopi kathinubbhārā, na tu saṅghā, na bhikkhuto.
tika-vin10t:8690: Tattha yo cīvaruppādo, ānisaṃsā ca pañcime.
tika-vin10t:8700: Tattha sīmāya detīti, antosīmaṃ gatehi tu;
tika-vin10t:8703: Katikāya ca dinnaṃ ye, vihārā ekalābhakā;
tika-vin10t:8706: Saṅghassa dhuvakārā hi, yattha karīyanti tattha ca;
tika-vin10t:8709: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, ujubhūtena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:8713: Thokā vā bahu vā bhikkhū, samabhāgova vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8715: Vassaṃvuṭṭhassa saṅghassa, cīvaraṃ deti yaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:8718: Yāguyā pana bhatte vā, detiādissa ce pana;
tika-vin10t:8721: Puggalaṃ pana uddissa, cīvaraṃ yaṃ tu dīyati;
tika-vin10t:8722: Puggalodissakaṃ nāma, dānaṃ taṃ tu pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:8725: Ayaṃ mayhaṃ parikkhāro, mātuyā pitunopi vā.
tika-vin10t:8728: Na hoti pana taṃ tesaṃ, saṅghasseva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8730: Pañcannaṃ accaye dānaṃ, na ca rūhati kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8731: Saṅghasseva ca taṃ hoti, gihīnaṃ pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8733: Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā, kālaṃ bhikkhunupassaye;
tika-vin10t:8736: Bhikkhunī sāmaṇerī vā, vihārasmiṃ sace matā;
tika-vin10t:8737: Honti tassā parikkhārā, bhikkhunīnaṃ tu santakā.
tika-vin10t:8742: Evaṃ dinnavidhiṃ ñatvā, matassa vāmatassa vā;
tika-vin10t:8749: Pattesu alliyā pattaṃ, tathā pattañca nīliyā.
tika-vin10t:8751: Kusumbhaṃ kiṃsukaṃ pupphe, tace loddañca kaṇḍulaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8752: Ṭhapetvā rajanaṃ sabbaṃ, phalaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8755: Alliyā pana pattena, dhovituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8757: Cīvarānaṃ kathā sesā, paṭhame kathine pana;
tika-vin10t:8774: Ratticchedo kathaṃ vutto, vattabhedo kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:8798: Oṇojanaṃ tathā bhattaṃ, labhate pañcime pana.
tika-vin10t:8805: Etāni pana cattāri, vuttāni ca mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:8812: Etesaṃ tu catunnampi, samattā samathā matā.
tika-vin10t:8820: Vivādo sammati dvīhi, anuvādo catūhi ca;
tika-vin10t:8838: Lajjī alajjī bāloti, kena sakkā vijānituṃ?
tika-vin10t:8844: Nāpajjati ca sañcicca, āpattiṃ na ca gūhati;
tika-vin10t:8853: Alajjī sānuvādo ca, asucī kammato ca yo;
tika-vin10t:8862: Yathā ca tiṇapaṇṇena, channaṃ gūthañca muttakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8863: Na ca vāyati duggandhaṃ, vūpasammati taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:8866: Diṭṭhāvikammikañceva, yo ca tattha na hoti taṃ.
tika-vin10t:8873: Rukkhe vā pana kuṭṭevā, aṭṭāne thambhakesu vā;
tika-vin10t:8880: Kataṃ taṃ mallakaṃ nāma, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8886: Vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, katakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8891: Osaṇheyya sake kese, yo hatthaphaṇakena vā;
tika-vin10t:8900: Ādāse udapatte vā, yattha katthaci attano;
tika-vin10t:8906: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8907: Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8915: ‘‘Passissāmī’’ti naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā pana vāditaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8916: Vihārato vihāraṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8919: Ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā, passatopi ca vīthiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8921: Kesā dīghā na dhāreyyā, yo dhāreyyassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8922: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8924: Nakhe nāsikalomāni, dīghāni na tu dhāraye;
tika-vin10t:8925: Na ca vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ vā, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:8927: Kappāpeyya visuṃ massuṃ, dāṭhikaṃ vā ṭhapeyya yo;
tika-vin10t:8928: Saṃharāpeyya vā lomaṃ, sambādhe tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8930: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kese kattarikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:8937: Na doso chindato aṅgaṃ, mocentassa ca lohitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8942: Na bhuñje na pive naggo, na khāde na ca sāyaye;
tika-vin10t:8943: Na dade na ca gaṇheyya, na gaccheyyapi añjasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8946: Parikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ, na naggena ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:8951: Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ, bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8955: Ekamañcepi vā tesaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8958: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyya, palitaṃ na ca gāhaye.
tika-vin10t:8963: Agilāno sace bhikkhu, chattaṃ dhāreyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8972: Lokāyataṃ na vāceyya, na ca taṃ pariyāpuṇe;
tika-vin10t:8975: Na ca vaṭṭati dhāretuṃ, sabbā cāmaribījanī;
tika-vin10t:8976: Na cālimpeyya dāyaṃ vā, na ca lañje mukhampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8987: Lasuṇaṃ na ca khādeyya, sace nākallako siyā;
tika-vin10t:8997: Na ca dhāraṇiyā uṇhī, sabbā bāhiralomikā.
tika-vin10t:9017: Dīghato ca diyaḍḍhaṃ vā, dvihatthanti kurundiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9026: Suddhaṃ tamālapattañca, paṇṇesu na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9033: Yadetaṃ tividhaṃ tūlaṃ, bhisiyaṃ taṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9034: Missaṃ tamālapattaṃ tu, sabbattha pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9037: Kārentassa karoto vā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9039: Jātakaṃ pana vatthuṃ vā, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:9042: Samānāsaniko nāma, dvīhi vassehi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:9043: Vuḍḍho vā daharo vāpi, vassenekena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:9048: Heṭṭhā dīghāsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, yaṃ pahoti nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9049: Ekamañcepi pīṭhe vā, dve nisīdanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9062: Pātova gāhite añño, bhikkhu senāsane pana;
tika-vin10t:9063: Sace yācati āgantvā, vattabbo gāhitanti so.
tika-vin10t:9069: Gahetvā kappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, datvā tassattano pana.
tika-vin10t:9072: Gāhitaṃ gaṇha’’iccevaṃ, vatvā gacchati so disaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9074: Uppabbajati ce tattha, gataṭṭhāne, na labbhati;
tika-vin10t:9075: Gahetuṃ tassa sampattaṃ, saṅghikaṃyeva taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:9077: Manusse sammukhā tattha, paṭicchāpeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:9080: Ārāmo ca vihāro ca, vatthūni duvidhassapi;
tika-vin10t:9084: Vāsi pharasu kuddālo, kuṭhārī ca nikhādanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9086: Valli veḷu tiṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ, muñjapabbajameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9087: Mattikā dārubhaṇḍañca, pañcamaṃ tu yathāha ca.
tika-vin10t:9098: Bhikkhunā garubhaṇḍaṃ tu, saṅghena hi gaṇena vā;
tika-vin10t:9115: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ taṃ, lohabhaṇḍaṃ tu kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9122: Na doso saṅghike atthi, gihīnaṃ santakesu vā.
tika-vin10t:9140: Kiñci saṅghassa dinnaṃ ce, taṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9142: Nhāpitassa ca saṇḍāso, kattarī ca mahattarī;
tika-vin10t:9145: Valli saṅghassa dinnā vā, tatthajātāpi rakkhitā;
tika-vin10t:9151: Nāḷikerassa hīre vā, vāke vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9154: Veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā, rakkhito tatthajātako;
tika-vin10t:9160: Muñjādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, muṭṭhimattaṃ garuṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:9164: Mattikā pakatī vāpi, pañcavaṇṇā sudhāpi vā.
tika-vin10t:9166: Silesādīsu vā kiñci, dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9172: Rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ vāpi, gahetabbaṃ tu gaṇhatā;
tika-vin10t:9173: Samakaṃ atirekaṃ vā, datvā phātikameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9200: Bījanī pacchi caṅkoṭaṃ, sabbā sammuñjanī garu.
tika-vin10t:9202: Yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yo koci kaṭasārako;
tika-vin10t:9220: Patto kañcanako ceva, thālakaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9242: Patto avassikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, likhitvā ṭhapitopi ca.
tika-vin10t:9248: Gahetuṃ labhati taṃ pacchā, sāmaṇerassa pāḷiyā.
tika-vin10t:9251: Ajja so upasampanno, atītā ṭhitikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:9253: Sace pana salākā tu, laddhā bhattaṃ na taṃdine;
tika-vin10t:9254: Laddhaṃ, punadine tassa, gāhetabbaṃ, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:9257: Visuñhi ṭhitikā katvā, dātabbā tu salākikā.
tika-vin10t:9260: Laddhamuttaribhaṅgaṃ vā, na laddhaṃ bhattameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9262: Yena yena hi yaṃ yaṃ tu, na laddhaṃ, tassa tassa ca;
tika-vin10t:9263: Taṃ taṃ punadine cāpi, gāhetabbanti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9289: Oguṇṭhanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, sīse cīvarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9290: Na hi tena ca dhotabbā, pādā pānīyavārinā.
tika-vin10t:9316: Iccevaṃ pana vattabbaṃ, deyyaṃ senāsanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9324: Sahasā pavise nāpi, sahasā na ca nikkhame;
tika-vin10t:9334: Nakkhattaṃ tena yogo ca, jānitabbā disāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:9339: Sahasā ubbhajitvā vā, na ca vaccakuṭiṃ vise;
tika-vin10t:9340: Ukkāsitvā bahi ṭhatvā, pavise saṇikaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9342: Vaccaṃ na nitthunantena, kātabbaṃ pana bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:9343: Khādato dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9345: Vaccaṃ pana na kātabbaṃ, bahiddhā vaccadoṇiyā;
tika-vin10t:9349: Chaḍḍeyya na ca pāteyya, kheḷaṃ passāvadoṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9354: Nācameyya sace vaccaṃ, katvā yo salile sati;
tika-vin10t:9357: Sasaddaṃ nācametabbaṃ, katvā capu capūti ca;
tika-vin10t:9364: Chaḍḍeyya kumbhi rittā ce, kumbhiṃ pūreyya vārinā.
tika-vin10t:9366: Anajjhiṭṭho hi vuḍḍhena, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9367: Dhammaṃ na ca bhaṇe, pañhaṃ, na puccheyya na vissaje.
tika-vin10t:9373: Anāpucchā hi sajjhāyo, na kātabbo kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:9375: Uddesopi na kātabbo, paripucchāya kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9376: Na ca dhammo kathetabbo, bhikkhunā dhammacakkhunā.
tika-vin10t:9378: Na dīpo vijjhāpetabbo, kātabbo vā na ceva so;
tika-vin10t:9382: Tampi cīvarakaṇṇena, kāyena na ca ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9384: Purato neva therānaṃ, nhāyeyya na panūpari;
tika-vin10t:9385: Uttaraṃ otarantānaṃ, dade maggaṃ, na ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9393: Tasmā hi vattaṃ pūreyya, jinaputto vicakkhaṇo;
tika-vin10t:9398: Kāyaṃ ūruṃ thanaṃ vāpi, vivaritvāna bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9399: Attano aṅgajātaṃ vā, bhikkhussa na ca dassaye.
tika-vin10t:9401: Bhikkhunā saha yaṃ kiñci, sampayojentiyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9402: Tato bhāsantiyā bhikkhuṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9404: Na ca bhikkhuniyā dīghaṃ, dhāreyya kāyabandhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9407: Vilīvena ca paṭṭena, cammapaṭṭena vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9410: Na phāsukā nametabbā, dukkaṭaṃ tu namentiyā;
tika-vin10t:9413: Hatthaṃ vā hatthakocchaṃ vā, pādaṃ vā mukhamūrukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9414: Koṭṭāpeti sace tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9416: Na mukhaṃ limpitabbaṃ tu, na cuṇṇetabbameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9419: Aṅgarāgo na kātabbo, mukharāgopi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9420: Avaṅgaṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, na kātabbaṃ visesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9423: Ṭhātabbaṃ na ca sāloke, sanaccaṃ na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:9426: Suraṃ vā pana maṃsaṃ vā, paṇṇaṃ vā vikkiṇantiyā.
tika-vin10t:9428: Vaḍḍhiṃ vāpi vaṇijjaṃ vā, payojetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9429: Tirīṭaṃ kañcukaṃ vāpi, yadi dhāreti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9431: Dāso vā pana dāsī vā, tathā kammakaropi vā;
tika-vin10t:9434: Na ca bhikkhuniyā sabba-nīlādiṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9435: Dhāretabbaṃ, na dhāreyya, sabbaṃ namatakampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9440: Dūratova ca passitvā, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9443: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca passitvā, pattaṃ bhikkhaṃ carantiyā;
tika-vin10t:9455: Yassā pabbajjakāle tu, gabbho vuṭṭhāti itthiyā;
tika-vin10t:9456: Putto yadi ca tassāpi, dātabbā dutiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:9459: Maṇḍetumpi ure katvā, setuṃ labhati sā pana.
tika-vin10t:9461: Ṭhapetvā sahaseyyaṃ tu, tasmiṃ dutiyikāya hi;
tika-vin10t:9464: Vibbhameneva sā hoti, yasmā idha abhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9473: Na vaccakuṭiyā vacco, kātabbo yāya kāyaci;
tika-vin10t:9476: Na ca vaṭṭati sabbattha, pallaṅkena nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9479: Na ca bhikkhuniyāraññe, vatthabbaṃ tu kathañcana;
tika-vin10t:9480: Atitthe naratitthe vā, nhāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9483: Nhāyeyya paṭisote vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9486: Dinnaṃ abhutvā aññassa, dentiyā pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9510: Cīvarādiparikkhāraṃ, saṅgho yaṃ deti tassa hi.
tika-vin10t:9513: Evaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ tu, hoti taṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9516: Sammuti ceva dānañca, paṭiggāho ca sattamo.
tika-vin10t:9522: Tassa nissāraṇā vuttā, yā sā nissāraṇāti hi.
tika-vin10t:9548: Sammuti nāma sīmādi, sā pañcadasadhā matā;
tika-vin10t:9573: Imesaṃ tu vasā ñeyyā, dasekā samanubhāsanā.
tika-vin10t:9584: Sesāni apaloketvā, kātuṃ pana na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9605: Na parāmasati vatthuñca, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9607: Na parāmasati ñattiṃ vā, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:9611: Na parāmasati vatthuṃ vā, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9617: Vuttā uposathe tāva, khandhake sabbaso mayā.
tika-vin10t:9620: Chando ca na panānīto, paṭikkosanti sammukhā.
tika-vin10t:9622: Evaṃ tivaṅgiko doso, parisāya vasā siyā;
tika-vin10t:9623: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chando ca na panāgato.
tika-vin10t:9626: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chandopi ca samāhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:9631: Catutthikā siyuṃ dosā, dasa dve parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:9632: Evaṃ dvādasadhā ettha, kammāni hi vipajjare.
tika-vin10t:9637: Suṇātha nipuṇe pañhe, gūḷhatthe bhaṇato mama.
tika-vin10t:9639: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattiṃyeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:9640: Kathañca paṭiggaṇhanto, na gaṇhanto kathaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9646: Asamāpattilābhissa, kā ca nāmassa sā bhave.
tika-vin10t:9648: Garukaṃ bhaṇato saccaṃ, alikaṃ bhaṇato siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:9649: Lahuṃ saccaṃ bhaṇantassa, musā ca bhaṇato garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9651: Pavisanto ca ārāmaṃ, āpajjati na nikkhamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9652: Nikkhamantova āpatti, na ceva pavisaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:9659: Āpajjati ca dhārento, adhārento tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:9660: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti? Bhaṇāhi me.
tika-vin10t:9663: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātāpitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:9665: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9666: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhave;
tika-vin10t:9673: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, na so pārājiko kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9678: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:9679: Chiddaṃ gehassa nevatthi, kathaṃ methunato cuto;
tika-vin10t:9685: Sabbattha nipuṇā dhīrā, ime pañhe bhaṇanti te.
tika-vin10t:9692: Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:9693: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9696: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9701: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin10t:9702: Bhinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9708: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9710: Pattassa pariyante vā, tathā pattamukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:9711: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9717: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:9722: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vā, aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9723: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9731: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9733: Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9734: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9736: Saṅkhena maṇinā vāpi, aññenapi ca kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9737: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9739: Cīvaraṃ doṇiyaṃ katvā, nāpi ghaṭṭeyya muṭṭhinā;
tika-vin10t:9740: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9742: Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9745: Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:9746: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin10t:9748: Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin10t:9752: Na doso koci tatthassa, kātuṃ makaradantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9755: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9757: Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:9763: Akkhīni tattha dassetvā, koṭṭite pana kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9764: Kakkaṭakkhīni vā tattha, uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9766: Ghaṭaṃ deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā, makarassa mukhampi vā;
tika-vin10t:9767: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin10t:9769: Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9776: Rajjuyo na ca vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9779: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:9782: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9784: Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
tika-vin10t:9794: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin10t:9796: Tādisaṃ pana ghaṃsitvā, veṭhetvā suttakena vā;
tika-vin10t:9797: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:9799: Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin10t:9806: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9809: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:9812: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9815: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9818: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9821: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:9829: Tathā pattapidhāne ca, tālavaṇṭe ca bījane;
tika-vin10t:9843: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, na uddissa davaṃ kare;
tika-vin10t:9846: Kāyaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ vā, ūruṃ vā na tu dassaye;
tika-vin10t:9847: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu tā vāpi, na siñce udakādinā.
tika-vin10t:9850: Dukkaṭaṃ puna dātabbaṃ, gīvā naṭṭhepi jajjare.
tika-vin10t:9852: Codito so sace tehi, bhikkhūhi na dadeyyataṃ;
tika-vin10t:9856: Davā silaṃ pavijjhanto, dukkaṭā na ca muccati.
tika-vin10t:9864: Na ca bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, sampayojeyya kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9867: Bhikkhunīnaṃ have bhikkhu, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9868: Āpattiṃ vā sace tāsaṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9874: Aggaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ vā, pattādīsupyayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:9883: Pakkhipitvāna pākatthaṃ, cāletuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9886: Tattha cādīnavaṃ tassa, vattuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9889: Kataṃ nissāya dussīlaṃ, tayā viharatā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:9891: Bhattagge yāgupāne ca, antogāme ca vīthiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9894: Sutto khādañca bhuñjanto, vaccaṃ muttampi vā karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9900: Ekādasa abhabbā ca, garukaṭṭhā ca pañcime;
tika-vin10t:9901: Vandato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bāvīsati ca puggale.
tika-vin10t:9904: Dhammavādī ca sambuddho, vandanīyā tayo ime.
tika-vin10t:9909: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ panekassa, dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9918: Tattha appaṭikammā ca, yā ca vuṭṭhānagāminī;
tika-vin10t:9937: Tatraṭṭho pana so dvinnaṃ, kammaṃ kopeti saṅghikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9952: Vuttā samaṇakappā ca, pañca, pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-vin10t:9954: Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ, vidhiṃ paññattiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9963: Nidānaṃ tattha vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9967: Satāni hi cha ūnāni, tīṇi sāvatthiyā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9969: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t:9970: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhagge pakāsitā.
tika-vin10t:9976: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti te.
tika-vin10t:9993: Idaṃ catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ, ñatvā tattha patiṭṭhito;
tika-vin10t:10024: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, na vaḍḍhetabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t:10030: Viññāṇaṃ nevasaññā ca, dasa dve bhāvagocarā.
tika-vin10t:10038: Tāni dvādasa bhiyyo ca, ānāpānasatīpi ca;
tika-vin10t:10039: Sabbaso terasa vāpi, brahmaloke na jāyare.
tika-vin10t:10042: Aññe pana na jāyanti, sabbe jāyanti mānuse.
tika-vin10t:10044: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā ca dasāsubhā;
tika-vin10t:10053: Bhavanti hi abhiññāṇaṃ, kasiṇāni dasāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:10078: Cariyāyānukūlaṃ tu, tesu yaṃ attano pana.
tika-vin10t:10092: Tiṇṇaṃ tesaṃ vavatthāne, kate ettāvatā pana;
tika-vin10t:10093: Tiṇṇaṃ pana ca saccānaṃ, vavatthānaṃ kataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10107: Teneva ca upāyena, bhāvento so punappunaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10116: Yadi akkharabandhe vā, ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin10t:10122: Sabbassa pana lokassa, gāme sampiṇḍite viya.
tika-vin10t:10157: Yathā siddhimayaṃ patto, antarāyaṃ vinā tathā;
tika-vin10t:10167: Karontena pattaṃ mayā yaṃ tu puññaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10172: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racitoyaṃ vinayavinicchayo.
tika-vin10t:10181: Yo mayā racito sāro, vinayassa vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t:10194: Thullaccayaṃ mukhe vaṭṭa-kate vuttaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10202: Māse vā dukkaṭaṃ ūne, majjhe thullaccayaṃ tato.
tika-vin10t:10210: Dukkhe thullaccayaṃ jāte, mate pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10216: Thullaccayaṃ pariyāye, ñāte, no ce tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10225: Dvaṅge thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10231: Āmasantassa kāyena, kāyaṃ tu garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10233: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10237: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ vadaṃ dvinnaṃ, maggānaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10243: Santike garukaṃ hoti, sace jānāti sā pana.
tika-vin10t:10252: Aṅge sati panekasmiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10263: Anuddhaṃseti yo tassa, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10265: Okāsaṃ na ca kāretvā, hutvā cāvanacetano;
tika-vin10t:10272: Sabbo āpattibhedo hi, natthi kāci visesatā.
tika-vin10t:10301: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10304: Cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve, bhikkhu āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10321: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10326: Nipphādeti sace tassa, honti āpattiyo duve;
tika-vin10t:10327: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10331: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10334: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, nissaggiṃ dutiye phuse.
tika-vin10t:10337: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, dhote nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10340: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nissaggi gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10343: Samāpanne ca nissaggiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10346: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, kate nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10353: Aññaṃ pana navaṃ pattaṃ, cetāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:10355: Dve panāpattiyo bhikkhu, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:10356: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10359: Ekaṃ nissaggiyāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi so pana.
tika-vin10t:10362: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10364: Bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindanto duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10365: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, haṭe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10368: Vāyāpeti sace bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10373: Dve panāpattiyo so hi, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:10374: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10377: Kālaṃ atikkamento taṃ, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10380: Chārattato vinā tena, vasaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10382: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, saṅghikaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t:10383: Pariṇāmeti ce bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10406: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10409: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, panne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10415: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10418: Āroceti sace tassa, honti dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10423: Pathaviṃ khaṇato tassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10424: Pahāre ca pahāre ca, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t:10427: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pātento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10428: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, pāte pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:10431: Aropite dukkaṭaṃ tu, hoti pācitti ropite.
tika-vin10t:10433: Ujjhāpento paraṃ bhikkhuṃ, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10446: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10452: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesaṃ nikkaḍḍhite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10460: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t:10461: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, sitte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10467: Dutiye tatiye ceva, catutthepi ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:10470: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu aññāti-kāya dento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10471: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10474: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti pana sibbite.
tika-vin10t:10477: Saṃvidhāya tu gacchanto, phuse dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10488: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, nisajjaṃ tu raho pana;
tika-vin10t:10489: Kappento hi phuse dvepi, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10495: Dutiye tatiye cāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t:10499: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10510: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10515: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, dinne pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10517: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, uyyojento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10520: Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu kappento, kule pana sabhojane;
tika-vin10t:10523: Catutthe pañcame vāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t:10526: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, sabhatto ca nimantito;
tika-vin10t:10527: Kulesu pana cārittaṃ, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10530: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10532: Taduttariṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, viññāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10535: Uyyuttaṃ dassanatthāya, gacchanto dve phuse balaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10536: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t:10539: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti vasite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10541: Uyyodhikaṃ tu gacchanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10542: Gacchanto dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t:10545: Suraṃ vā pana mereyyaṃ, pivanto dve phuse muni;
tika-vin10t:10546: Gaṇhato dukkaṭaṃ pātuṃ, pīte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10549: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti hasite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10551: Kīḷanto udake bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10554: Yo panādariyaṃ bhikkhu, karonto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10555: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10557: Bhiṃsāpento have bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10563: Oraso addhamāsassa, nhāyanto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10580: Manusso marati tasmiṃ, patitvā ce parājayo.
tika-vin10t:10583: Patitvā maratī peto, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10588: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, paribhuñjaṃ duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10589: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10594: Jānaṃ bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento pana vajjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10598: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, sesā sampādite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10600: Jānaṃ tu theyyasatthena, saṃvidhāya saheva ca;
tika-vin10t:10603: Dve panāpattiyo honti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10606: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10610: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10619: Vinayaṃ tu vivaṇṇento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10622: Mohento dve phuse, mohe, dukkaṭaṃ tu aropite;
tika-vin10t:10625: Pahāraṃ kupito dento, bhikkhussa dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10626: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pahaṭe siyā.
tika-vin10t:10629: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuggirite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10632: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuddhaṃsite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10634: Bhikkhu sañcicca kukkuccaṃ, janayanto hi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:10635: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuppādite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10638: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ sotuṃ, pācitti suṇato siyā.
tika-vin10t:10640: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā tato puna;
tika-vin10t:10644: Adatvā gacchato tassa, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10646: Hatthapāsaṃ tu saṅghassa, jahato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10649: Samaggena ca saṅghena, datvāna saha cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10650: Khīyanto dve phuse pacchā, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10652: Lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ jānaṃ, saṅghikaṃ puggalassa hi;
tika-vin10t:10656: Pubbe avidito hutvā, rañño antepuraṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:10660: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10662: Ratanaṃ pana gaṇhanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10663: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10665: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, vikāle gāmakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:10666: Samaṇo pavisaṃ dose, āpajjati duve pana.
tika-vin10t:10669: Dukkaṭaṃ tassa niddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10675: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10677: Tūlonaddhaṃ tu mañcādiṃ, kārāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10678: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10680: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10697: Kati āpattiyo honti? Catassova bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:10700: Mate akkhāyite vāpi, bhikkhu pārājikaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10706: Kati āpattiyo honti? Pañca āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10711: Kāyena phusato kāyaṃ, bhikkhussa garukaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10712: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10734: Chādentī bhikkhunī vajjaṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10735: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, chādentī sā parājikā.
tika-vin10t:10746: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10750: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, samaṇī sā parājitā.
tika-vin10t:10762: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gacche, gamane dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10769: Āpattīnaṃ pabhede tu, kāci natthi visesatā.
tika-vin10t:10780: ‘‘Sahatthena gahetvā tvaṃ, khāda vā bhuñja vā’’tipi;
tika-vin10t:10781: Uyyojentī panevaṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10787: Uyyojeti ca yā tassā, imā tissoti dīpaye.
tika-vin10t:10789: Sattame aṭṭhame cāpi, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10794: Ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃyeva, phuse pācittiyaṃ tu sā.
tika-vin10t:10797: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10800: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, chinne, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10802: Viññāpetvāva aññaṃ ce, viññāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10805: Cetāpetvā hi aññaṃ ce, cetāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10808: Evameva ca sesesu, chaṭṭhādīsu ca sattasu;
tika-vin10t:10812: Lasuṇaṃ khādati dve ce, dukkaṭaṃ gahaṇe siyā;
tika-vin10t:10815: Saṃharāpentiyā lomaṃ, sambādhe dveva honti hi;
tika-vin10t:10816: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti saṃhaṭe.
tika-vin10t:10818: Karontī talaghātaṃ tu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10819: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10821: Jatunā maṭṭhakaṃ kiñci, sādiyantī duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10828: Hatthapāse tu pācitti, hitvā tiṭṭhati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10833: Uccārādiṃ tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍentī dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10834: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10837: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10843: Paṭhame dutiye ceva, tatiye ca catutthake;
tika-vin10t:10847: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, pakkamantī duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10852: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, āsane ce nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:10853: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti ca nisīdite.
tika-vin10t:10855: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ sabbaṃ, samānaṃ aṭṭhame pana;
tika-vin10t:10861: Vadhitvā pana attānaṃ, rodantī tu duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10862: Vadhati rodati pācitti, karotekaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10865: Naggā nhāyati dve ceva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10871: Cīvaraṃ tu visibbetvā, visibbāpetva vā pana;
tika-vin10t:10877: Sace saṅkamanīyaṃ tu, dhāreti pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10878: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pana dhārite.
tika-vin10t:10881: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10897: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tāsaṃ, nipanne itaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10900: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10905: Sace upassayaṃ datvā, nikkaḍḍhati ca bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t:10906: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, hoti pācitti kaḍḍhite.
tika-vin10t:10908: Chaṭṭhe pana ca saṃsaṭṭhā, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10911: Antoraṭṭhe tu sāsaṅke, cārikaṃ tu carantiyā;
tika-vin10t:10919: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi passati.
tika-vin10t:10922: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10924: Suttaṃ kantantiyā dveva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10927: Veyyāvaccaṃ gihīnaṃ tu, dveva honti karontiyā;
tika-vin10t:10928: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10931: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ chaṭṭhe, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10934: Aṭṭhamaṃ dutiye vagge, pañcamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:10937: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti hi pade pade.
tika-vin10t:10947: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10949: Akkosati ca yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t:10952: Yā hi caṇḍikabhāvena, gaṇaṃ tu paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t:10956: Bhuñjantī bhikkhunī sā hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10961: Kulaṃ tu maccharāyantī, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10962: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā maccharite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10970: Ovādatthāya vā bhikkhuṃ, saṃvāsatthāya vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:10971: Na gacchati sace tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10973: Ovādampi na yācantī, na gacchantī uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10980: Gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhapentī hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10997: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pacchā, hoti pācitti khīyite.

tika-vin10t:11004: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti dhārite.
tika-vin10t:11006: Yānena pana yāyantī, dve kirāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:11007: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti yadi yāyite.
tika-vin10t:11009: Dhārentiyā tu saṅghāṇiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:11010: Dhārite pana pācitti, catutthepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:11016: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca.
tika-vin10t:11021: Anāpucchā tu bhikkhussa, purato yā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:11022: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti tu nisīdite.
tika-vin10t:11025: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, vuttā pācitti pucchite.
tika-vin10t:11035: Tato bhikkhuniyā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11054: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:11055: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:11057: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:11058: Attano pana duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:11069: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:11082: Bhikkhunī tu sace hoti, pāṭidesaniyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:11084: Ājīvahetu sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā panattano;
tika-vin10t:11107: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:11108: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:11110: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:11119: Thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi sā phuse;
tika-vin10t:11123: Na pariccajati taṃ laddhiṃ, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t:11133: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, kati āpattiyo siyuṃ?
tika-vin10t:11134: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:11137: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11148: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11153: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, khandhake tu pavāraṇe?
tika-vin10t:11156: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, camme? Tissova dīpitā;
tika-vin10t:11157: Mārentānaṃ tu pācitti, gahetvā vacchatariṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:11160: Tassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11168: Kathine natthi āpatti, paññattaṃ kevalaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:11183: Chandassa dāyako bhikkhu, pācitti yadi khīyati;
tika-vin10t:11189: Attano aṅgajātaṃ tu, chindaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:11190: Romanthe hoti pācitti, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11192: Tathā senāsanasmiṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:11226: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi, tīhi vātha catūhi vā;
tika-vin10t:11229: Tattha pañcasamuṭṭhānā, kā cāpatti na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:11239: Pacchimehi ca tīheva, samuṭṭhāti na aññato.
tika-vin10t:11263: Tattha yā tu catutthena, samuṭṭhānena jāyate;
tika-vin10t:11302: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ tattha, catutthaṃ navamampi ca;
tika-vin10t:11309: Sabhojane, raho dve ca, aṅgulī, udake hasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11311: Pahāre, uggire ceva, tepaññāsā ca sekhiyā;
tika-vin10t:11333: Ukkoṭanaṃ =00 tathā ūno, saṃvāso, nāsanena ca;
tika-vin10t:11337: Kiṃ te, akālaṃ, acchinde, duggahā, nirayena vā.
tika-vin10t:11339: Gaṇassa ca vibhaṅgañca, dubbalāsā tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:11342: Sayaṃ upassayaṃ datvā, akkoseyya ca caṇḍikā;
tika-vin10t:11345: Pāyantiṃ, dve ca vassāni, saṅghenāsammatampi ca;
tika-vin10t:11348: Ūnadvādasavassā dve, tathālaṃ tāva teti ca;
tika-vin10t:11367: Pūvehi, paccayo jotiṃ, ratanaṃ, sūci, mañcakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11368: Tūlaṃ, nisīdanaṃ, kaṇḍu, vassikā, sugatassa ca.
tika-vin10t:11371: Saṅghikena duve vuttā, dve mahājanikena ca.
tika-vin10t:11383: Appasaddā duve vuttā, tathā na byāhareti ca;
tika-vin10t:11384: Chamā, nīcāsane, ṭhānaṃ, pacchato, uppathena ca.
tika-vin10t:11387: Paccakkhāmīti sikkhā ca, tathā kismiñcideva ca.
tika-vin10t:11389: Saṃsaṭṭhā dve, vadhitvā ca, visibbetvā ca dukkhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11390: Punadeva ca saṃsaṭṭhā, neva vūpasameyya ca.
tika-vin10t:11395: Sace me cīvaraṃ ayye, anubandhissasīti ca;
tika-vin10t:11402: Kathināni ca tīṇādi, patto, bhesajjameva ca;
tika-vin10t:11425: Naggaṃ, attharaṇaṃ, mañce, antoraṭṭhe, tathā bahi.
tika-vin10t:11428: Veyyāvaccaṃ, sahatthā ca, āvāse ca abhikkhuke.
tika-vin10t:11440: Sabbe cha panime dhammā, vācato vācacittato;
tika-vin10t:11447: Etā =03 catusamuṭṭhānā, sikkhā cuddasa honti hi;
tika-vin10t:11452: Paṭicchanne ca okāse, byūhe cāti ime chapi.
tika-vin10t:11471: Pañca āpattiyo honti, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu.
tika-vin10t:11479: Kati =04 āpattiyo honti, dutiyena tuvaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11483: Karonti ce kuṭiṃ tassa, vipannaṃ sabbathā pana.
tika-vin10t:11488: Tatiyena kati jāyanti, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11499: Siyuṃ kati catutthena, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11502: Hoti pārājikaṃ tassa, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu;
tika-vin10t:11508: Kati āpattiyo honti, pañcamena? Cha honti hi;
tika-vin10t:11516: Vāceti padaso dhammaṃ, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:11520: Cha ca saṃvidahitvāna, bhaṇḍaṃ harati ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:11540: Kā panāpattiyo nāma, lahukā garukāpi kā?
tika-vin10t:11543: Duṭṭhullā nāma kāpatti, aduṭṭhullāpi nāma kā?
tika-vin10t:11545: Niyatā nāma kāpatti, kā panāniyatāpi ca?
tika-vin10t:11570: Bhikkhū ca bhabbā atha bhikkhunī ca.

tika-vin10t:11601: Kathaṃ musā bhaṇantassa, garukaṃ hoti bhikkhuno?

tika-vin10t:11608: Kathaṃ vehāsago dosaṃ, na ca bhūmigato phuse?
tika-vin10t:11616: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjati, na nikkhamaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11617: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, pavisanto na ceva taṃ?
tika-vin10t:11623: Nikkhamantova āpattiṃ, phuseyya, pavisaṃ na ca.
tika-vin10t:11632: Yevaṃ anādiyantova, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11638: Samādiyanto āpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11640: Yo hi kammakato bhikkhu, vuttaṃ vattaṃ panattano;
tika-vin10t:11644: Na karonto kathaṃ nāma, samaṇo dosavā siyā?
tika-vin10t:11650: Akaronto panāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11652: Dento āpajjatāpattiṃ, na dentopi kathaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11653: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:11655: Cīvaraṃ dadamāno hi, dento āpajjate pana;
tika-vin10t:11665: Ovādañca na gaṇhanto, āpajjati hi vajjataṃ.
tika-vin10t:11670: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ, accajitvā nisevati;
tika-vin10t:11671: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11674: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:11676: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattimeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:11679: Sagāraseyyakaṃ =09 rattiṃ, āpajjati hi no divā;
tika-vin10t:11691: Na chindanto nakhe kese, āpajjati hi nāma so;
tika-vin10t:11697: Āpajjati hi dhārento, na dhārento kathaṃ pana?
tika-vin10t:11704: Atthāpatti hi tiṭṭhante, nāthe, no parinibbute;
tika-vin10t:11710: Āpattiyo imā dvepi, ṭhapetvā sugate pana;
tika-vin10t:11713: Kāleyeva siyāpatti, vikāle na siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11714: Vikāle tu siyāpatti, na kāle, ubhayatthapi?
tika-vin10t:11720: Sabbaṃ kāle vikāle ca, natthi tattha ca saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11722: Rattimeva panāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:11726: Divā, sesā panāpatti, siyā rattiṃ divāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:11728: Dasavasso tu no ūna-dasavasso siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11732: Āpattiṃ pana abyatto, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11737: Kāḷe āpajjatāpattiṃ, na juṇhe juṇhake kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11740: Vassaṃ anupagacchanto, kāḷe, no juṇhake pana;
tika-vin10t:11744: Kāḷe ceva ca juṇhe ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11746: Vassūpagamanaṃ kāḷe, no juṇhe, tu pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:11747: Juṇhe kappati, no kāḷe, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t:11750: Gimheyeva na sesesu, vasse no itaradvaye.
tika-vin10t:11755: Āpajjati ca hemante, nivāseti ca taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:11767: Ovassāpeti yo kāyaṃ, vasse āpajjatīdha so.
tika-vin10t:11769: Āpajjati hi saṅghova, na gaṇo na ca puggalo;
tika-vin10t:11770: Gaṇova na ca sesā hi, puggalova na cāpare.
tika-vin10t:11773: Saṅgho vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na gaṇo na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t:11776: Gaṇo vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na saṅgho na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t:11778: Suttuddesaṃ karonto vā, eko pana uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11779: Puggalopajjatāpattiṃ, na ca saṅgho gaṇo na ca.
tika-vin10t:11784: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:11787: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t:11790: Atthāpatti hi antova, na bahiddhā, tathā bahi;
tika-vin10t:11793: Anupakhajja seyyaṃ tu, kappento pana kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11794: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, antoyeva ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t:11797: Bahiyeva ca, no anto, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t:11852: Āpanno paṭibuddhova, sutto sujjhati so kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11858: Desento pana taṃ ñatvā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11861: Samathe tu sayantova, sutto vuṭṭhāti nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11867: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11876: Pacchā taṃ pana desento, sacittova visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11891: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammena visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11900: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammeneva sujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11909: Vuṭṭhānakāle saṅghena, kiñci kammaṃ na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:11918: Taṃ pacchā pana desento, visujjhati asammukhā.
tika-vin10t:11933: Atthāpatti ca sesaṃ tu, ubho nāpajjare pana.
tika-vin10t:11936: Vihāraṃ pavisanto ca, vicarantopi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t:11953: Samaṇo samaṇī kāya-saṃsaggaṃ tu karonti ce;
tika-vin10t:11957: Kāyassa pana saṃsaggo, ubhinnaṃ vatthu hoti hi.
tika-vin10t:11960: Āpajjati hi pācittiṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11998: Upajjhāyo phuse vajjaṃ, na ca saddhivihāriko.
tika-vin10t:12003: Sesaṃ panidha āpattiṃ, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t:12006: Ādiyanto garuṃ dosaṃ, payojento lahuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:12007: Ādiyanto lahuṃ dosaṃ, payojento garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:12012: Pādaṃ vāpi tato uddhaṃ, ādiyanto garuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:12018: Kāleyeva panāpatti, no vikāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t:12019: Vikāleyeva āpatti, na ca kāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t:12021: Atthāpatti hi kāle ca, vikāle ca pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t:12022: Neva kāle vikāle ca, atthāpatti pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t:12028: Sesaṃ kāle vikāle ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:12033: Kiṃ paṭiggahitaṃ kāle, no vikāle tu kappati?
tika-vin10t:12034: Vikāle kiñca no kāle, gahitaṃ pana kappati?
tika-vin10t:12036: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kiṃ nāma vada kappati?
tika-vin10t:12037: Neva kāle ca kiṃ nāma, no vikāle ca kappati?
tika-vin10t:12040: Kāleyeva tu bhikkhūnaṃ, no vikāle tu kappati.
tika-vin10t:12043: Vikāleyeva kāle ca, aparajju na kappati.
tika-vin10t:12046: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kappatīti viniddise.
tika-vin10t:12052: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:12055: Majjhime pana desasmiṃ, na ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t:12060: Sīmaṃ samudde bandhanto, bhikkhu paccantimesu hi;
tika-vin10t:12066: Dhārento majjhime vajjaṃ, phuse paccantimesu no;
tika-vin10t:12070: Paccantimesu vā bhikkhu, nāpajjati na majjhime.
tika-vin10t:12072: Paccantimesu desesu, kappate na ca majjhime;
tika-vin10t:12073: Kappate, majjhime dese, no ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t:12076: Paccantimesu cevāpi, kiṃ na kappati majjhime?
tika-vin10t:12079: Niddise kappatī ceva, na ca kappati majjhime.
tika-vin10t:12084: Paccantimesu desesu, evaṃ vuttaṃ na kappati;
tika-vin10t:12088: Ubhayatthapi taṃ sabbaṃ, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:12090: Anto āpajjatāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi;
tika-vin10t:12091: Bahi āpajjatāpattiṃ, na ca anto kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12094: Neva anto ca āpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t:12097: Saṅghikaṃ pana mañcādiṃ, ajjhokāse tu kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:12099: Nikkhipitvāna gacchanto, no anto, bahiyeva ca;
tika-vin10t:12105: Gāme āpajjatāpattiṃ, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12106: Āpajjati araññasmiṃ, na ca gāme kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12108: Āpajjati ca gāmepi, araññepi kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12109: Nevāpajjati gāmepi, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12112: Āpajjati hi taṃ bhikkhu, gāmasmiṃ, no araññake.
tika-vin10t:12114: Agaṇā aruṇaṃ nāma, uṭṭhāpentī ca bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:12115: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, araññe, no ca gāmake.
tika-vin10t:12121: Agilānova āpattiṃ, phuse, no ca gilānako.
tika-vin10t:12123: Agilāno gilāno ca, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t:12124: Nāpajjanti gilāno ca, agilāno ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t:12126: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:12129: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t:12142: Yo tattha cīvaruppādo, so ca nesaṃ bhavissati;
tika-vin10t:12149: Gadrabhassa vasā ceti, vasā pañcavidhā matā.
tika-vin10t:12192: Āpattiṃ pana jānāti, anāpattiṃ garuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12201: Satta sāmīciyo vuttā, satteva samathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:12206: Pupphena ca phalenāpi, cuṇṇenapi ca dūsako.
tika-vin10t:12214: Kataṃ ahatthapāsepi, na ca bhuttāvinā kataṃ;
tika-vin10t:12227: Iti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, sabbameva ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12244: Musā na bhāse, na ca majjapo siyā;
tika-vin10t:12248: Mālaṃ na dhāre, na ca gandhamācare;
tika-vin10t:12258: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, nava maṃsāni khādato.
tika-vin10t:12265: Akappiyāni maṃsāni, dasa sukkāni ve dasa.
tika-vin10t:12267: Jāti nāmañca gottañca, kammaṃ sippañca rogatā;
tika-vin10t:12268: Liṅgāpatti kilesā ca, akkosena daseva hi.
tika-vin10t:12273: Dasa kammapathā puññā, apuññāpi tathā dasa;
tika-vin10t:12295: Pattā akappiyā vuttā, ekādasa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12308: Gaṇṭhikā kappiyā vuttā, ekādasa ca vīdhakā.
tika-vin10t:12319: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṃ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12332: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:12336: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ suṇataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:12340: Paṭicca methunaṃ dhammaṃ, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12343: Mukhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t:12345: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t:12348: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:12351: Sayaṃ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t:12358: Parassa tu parikkhāraṃ, na ca pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12361: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t:12363: Attano santakaṃ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12366: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t:12367: Hantvānantariyaṃ kammaṃ, na phuseyya kathaṃ naro?
tika-vin10t:12373: Gacchaṃ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12379: Kathaṃ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t:12385: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṃ, vattaṃ so vuṭṭhito kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12395: Vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṃ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t:12398: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:12401: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṃ ghasati bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12404: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12405: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:12408: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:12410: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12411: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12416: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:12417: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12422: Ekissā dve siyuṃ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t:12423: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12426: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:12432: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:12434: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṃ gato;
tika-vin10t:12435: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t:12438: Na so labhati aññesaṃ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:12441: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t:12444: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t:12449: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṃ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12450: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t:12463: Parassā pana yā vajjaṃ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:12471: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t:12474: Anuggiraṃ giraṃ kiñci, subhaṃ vā yadi vāsubhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12475: Phuse vācasikaṃ vajjaṃ, kathaṃ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12489: Saṃvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṃ theniṃsu bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12490: Thero thullaccayaṃ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12492: Kathaṃ? Chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t:12493: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:12500: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:12501: Chiddaṃ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t:12506: Sappiādiṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, gahetvā sāmameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:12513: Ekatova kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12515: Saṅghe pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t:12529: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṃ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t:12531: Kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṃ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:12534: Purisaṃ apitaraṃ hantvā, itthiṃ hantvā amātaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12537: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, pitaraṃ itthitaṃ gataṃ;
tika-vin10t:12538: Mātaraṃ purisattaṃ tu, gataṃ hantvā garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:12540: Mātaraṃ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t:12546: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṃ, saṅgho kammaṃ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t:12547: Kathaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ taṃ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12561: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṃ;
tika-vin10t:12576: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t:12583: Nānitthīnaṃ tu kese vā, tāsaṃ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t:12584: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t:12595: Methunaṃ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t:12600: Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṃ na ca;
tika-vin10t:12601: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t:12617: Ekassa kammaṃ tu na rūhate kiṃ?
tika-vin10t:12624: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t:12625: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṃ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t:12627: Na ca kappakataṃ vatthaṃ, na ca rattaṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12631: Na cassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:12633: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t:12634: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t:12652: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṃ, kathaṃ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12658: Dvijaṃ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12678: Nidānaṃ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12681: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t:12685: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t:12690: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t:12691: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:12697: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12708: Vosāsantī ca naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā cārikadvayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12721: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṃ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t:12733: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t:12736: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12741: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12742: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t:12747: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t:12748: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12751: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṃsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12753: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t:12756: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t:12759: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t:12760: Nissaggiyāni tiṃseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:12763: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12765: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12771: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t:12772: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t:12778: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12783: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṃ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t:12804: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12808: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t:12810: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t:12826: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12829: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t:12834: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṃ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t:12848: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12849: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t:12860: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t:12861: Sikkhāpadaṃ tu paññattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t:12867: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12869: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12872: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t:12897: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t:12902: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t:12911: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t:12928: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12939: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:12979: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12982: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:12983: Kati thullaccayaṃ maṃse, kati maṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12988: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12994: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12995: Abhirūhati nāvaṃ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:12998: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:13000: Kati vācasikā rattiṃ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t:13001: Duve vācasikā rattiṃ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t:13013: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t:13016: Manussassa visaṃ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t:13017: Hoti pārājikaṃ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:13020: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:13034: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t:13038: Ratticchedo katīnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t:13041: Ratticchedo duvinnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13044: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t:13055: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13058: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:13066: Pārājikaṃ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mate.
tika-vin10t:13078: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t:13081: Dvīhi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13087: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṃ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t:13089: Visaṃ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t:13090: Pārājikaṃ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:13095: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t:13101: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13108: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:13114: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t:13125: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t:13135: Gahetvā bhojanaṃ kiñci, sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13147: Olokentassa vā vuttaṃ, mukhaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t:13158: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t:13162: Dve tayo anusāvetuṃ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:13164: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t:13174: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t:13186: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:13188: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṃ tu, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:13191: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t:13192: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13207: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t:13217: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t:13218: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t:13229: Vāceti ca paraṃ niccaṃ, atthaṃ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t:13231: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t:13257: Rājā pātu mahiṃ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t:13259: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t:13271: Akāsiṃ paramaṃ etaṃ, uttaraṃ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t:13272: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13279: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo samattoti.
